```ts
  onLongTap?: (pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMapTypeChanged?: (mapType: naver.maps.MapType) => void;
  onMapTypeIdChanged?: (mapTypeId: string) => void;
  onMouseDown?: (pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseMove?: (pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOut?: (pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOver?: (pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseUp?: (pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onPanning?: () => void;
  onPinch?: (pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onPinchEnd?: (pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onPinchStart?: (pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onProjectionChanged?: (projection: naver.maps.Projection) => void;
  onRemoveLayer?: (layerName: string) => void;
  onResize?: () => void;
  onRightClick?: (pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onSingleTap?: (pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchEnd?: (pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchMove?: (pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchStart?: (pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTwoFingerTap?: (pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onWheel?: (pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onZoomChanged?: (zoom: number) => void;
  onZooming?: () => void;
  onZoomStart?: () => void;
}

type NaverMapDivProps = Omit<React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<"div">, "children" | "draggable">;

export type NaverMapProps = NaverMapOptionProps &
  NaverMapLifecycleProps &
  NaverMapEventProps &
  NaverMapDivProps;

export interface NaverMapRef {
  getInstance: () => naver.maps.Map | null;
  addOverlayPane: (name: string, elementOrZIndex: HTMLElement | number) => void;
  addPane: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["addPane"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["addPane"]> | undefined;
  autoResize: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["autoResize"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["autoResize"]> | undefined;
  destroy: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["destroy"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["destroy"]> | undefined;
  fitBounds: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["fitBounds"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["fitBounds"]> | undefined;
  getBounds: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getBounds"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getBounds"]> | undefined;
  getCenter: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getCenter"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getCenter"]> | undefined;
  getCenterPoint: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getCenterPoint"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getCenterPoint"]> | undefined;
  getElement: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getElement"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getElement"]> | undefined;
  getMapTypeId: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getMapTypeId"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getMapTypeId"]> | undefined;
  getMaxZoom: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getMaxZoom"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getMaxZoom"]> | undefined;
  getMinZoom: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getMinZoom"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getMinZoom"]> | undefined;
  getOptions: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getOptions"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getOptions"]> | undefined;
  getPanes: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getPanes"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getPanes"]> | undefined;
  getPrimitiveProjection: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getPrimitiveProjection"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getPrimitiveProjection"]> | undefined;
  getProjection: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getProjection"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getProjection"]> | undefined;
  getSize: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getSize"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getSize"]> | undefined;
  getZoom: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getZoom"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getZoom"]> | undefined;
  morph: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["morph"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["morph"]> | undefined;
  panBy: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["panBy"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["panBy"]> | undefined;
  panTo: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["panTo"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["panTo"]> | undefined;
  panToBounds: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["panToBounds"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["panToBounds"]> | undefined;
  refresh: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["refresh"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["refresh"]> | undefined;
  removeOverlayPane: (name: string) => void;
  removePane: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["removePane"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["removePane"]> | undefined;
  setCenter: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["setCenter"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["setCenter"]> | undefined;
  setCenterPoint: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["setCenterPoint"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["setCenterPoint"]> | undefined;
  setMapTypeId: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["setMapTypeId"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["setMapTypeId"]> | undefined;
  setOptions: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["setOptions"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["setOptions"]> | undefined;
  setSize: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["setSize"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["setSize"]> | undefined;
  setZoom: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["setZoom"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["setZoom"]> | undefined;
  stop: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["stop"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["stop"]> | undefined;
  updateBy: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["updateBy"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["updateBy"]> | undefined;
  zoomBy: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["zoomBy"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["zoomBy"]> | undefined;
}
```

## Map option properties

| Prop                      | Type                                            | Description                    |
| ------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------ |
| `background` | `string` | Map background color/image URL |
| `baseTileOpacity` | `number` | Default tile layer opacity (0-1) |
| `bounds` | `naver.maps.Bounds \| naver.maps.BoundsLiteral` | Initial display boundary |
| `center` | `naver.maps.Coord \| naver.maps.CoordLiteral` | Map center coordinates (controlled) |
| `defaultCenter` | `naver.maps.Coord \| naver.maps.CoordLiteral` | Initial center coordinates (uncontrolled) |
| `zoom` | `number` | Map zoom level (controlled) |
| `defaultZoom` | `number` | Initial zoom level (uncontrolled) |
| `disableDoubleClickZoom` | `boolean` | Disable double click zoom |
| `disableDoubleTapZoom` | `boolean` | Disable double tap zoom |
| `disableKineticPan` | `boolean` | Disable inertial scrolling |
| `disableTwoFingerTapZoom` | `boolean` | Disable two-finger tap zoom |
| `draggable` | `boolean` | Map draggability |
| `keyboardShortcuts` | `boolean` | Whether to allow keyboard shortcuts |
| `logoControl` | `boolean` | Whether or not to expose the logo control |
| `logoControlOptions` | `naver.maps.LogoControlOptions` | Logo control detailed options |
| `mapDataControl` | `boolean` | Whether map data control is exposed |
| `mapDataControlOptions` | `naver.maps.MapDataControlOptions` | Map data control detailed options |
| `mapTypeControl` | `boolean` | Whether to expose map type control |
| `mapTypeControlOptions` | `naver.maps.MapTypeControlOptions` | Map type control detailed options |
| `mapTypeId` | `naver.maps.MapTypeIdLiteral` | Map Type ID |
| `mapTypes` | `naver.maps.MapTypeRegistry` | Set of available map types |
| `maxBounds` | `naver.maps.Bounds \| naver.maps.BoundsLiteral` | Maximum moveable border |
| `maxZoom` | `number` | Maximum zoom allowed |
| `minZoom` | `number` | Minimum zoom allowed |
| `padding` | `naver.maps.padding` | viewport inner margin |
| `pinchZoom` | `boolean` | Whether to allow pinch zoom |
| `resizeOrigin` | `naver.maps.Position` | Resizing reference point |
| `scaleControl` | `boolean` | Whether scale control is exposed |
| `scaleControlOptions` | `naver.maps.ScaleControlOptions` | Scale Control Detailed Options |
| `scrollWheel` | `boolean` | Whether to allow mouse wheel zoom |
| `size` | `naver.maps.Size \| naver.maps.SizeLiteral` | Specify map size |
| `overlayZoomEffect` | `null\| string` | Overlay Zoom Effect Type |
| `tileSpare` | `number` | Tile render free area |
| `tileTransition` | `boolean` | Whether to use tile transition animation |
| `tileDuration` | `number` | Tile transition animation time |
| `zoomControl` | `boolean` | Whether zoom control is exposed |
| `zoomControlOptions` | `naver.maps.ZoomControlOptions` | Zoom control detailed options |
| `zoomOrigin` | `naver.maps.Coord \| naver.maps.CoordLiteral` | Zoom operation reference coordinates |
| `blankTileImage` | `null\| string` | Tile blank image URL |
| `gl` | `boolean` | Whether to activate GL submodule vector map |
| `customStyleId` | `string` | Style Editor published style ID |

## Life cycle and error handling properties

| Prop           | Type                            | Description                     |
| -------------- | ------------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| `children` | `React.ReactNode` | Child elements to render inside the map |
| `onMapReady` | `(map: naver.maps.Map) => void` | Map instance creation completion callback |
| `onMapDestroy` | `() => void` | Map instance cleanup complete callback |
| `onMapError` | `(error: Error) => void` | Create/Update Failure Callback |
| `retryOnError` | `boolean` | Whether to retry SDK in case of error |
| `retryDelayMs` | `number` | Retry Delay (ms) |
| `fallback` | `React.ReactNode` | Alternative UI to display during SDK loading/error |
| `suspense` | `boolean` | SDK loading handled with React Suspense |

## Map event properties

| Prop                   | Type                                              | Description                |
| ---------------------- | ------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------- |
| `onAddLayer` | `(layer: naver.maps.Layer) => void` | Add layer event |
| `onBoundsChanged` | `(bounds: naver.maps.Bounds) => void` | Coordinate boundary change event |
| `onCenterChanged` | `(center: naver.maps.Coord) => void` | Center coordinate change event |
| `onCenterPointChanged` | `(centerPoint: naver.maps.Point) => void` | Center world coordinate change event |
| `onClick` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Map click event |
| `onDblClick` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Map double click event |
| `onDoubleTap` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Double Tap Event |
| `onDrag` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | drag event |
| `onDragEnd` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Drag end event |
| `onDragStart` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | drag start event |
| `onIdle` | `() => void` | Map Idle Event |
| `onInit` | `() => void` | Map reset event |
| `onKeyDown` | `(keyboardEvent: KeyboardEvent) => void` | key down event |
| `onKeyUp` | `(keyboardEvent: KeyboardEvent) => void` | Key Up Event |
| `onLongTap` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Long Tap Event |
| `onMapTypeChanged` | `(mapType: naver.maps.MapType) => void` | Map type object change event |
| `onMapTypeIdChanged` | `(mapTypeId: string) => void` | Map type ID change event |
| `onMouseDown` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | mouse down event |
| `onMouseMove` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | mouse movement event |
| `onMouseOut` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | mouse out event |
| `onMouseOver` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | mouseover event |
| `onMouseUp` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | mouse up event |
| `onPanning` | `() => void` | Panning start event |
| `onPinch` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Pinch Event |
| `onPinchEnd` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Pinch End Event |
| `onPinchStart` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Pinch Start Event |
| `onProjectionChanged` | `(projection: naver.maps.Projection) => void` | Map projection change event |
| `onRemoveLayer` | `(layerName: string) => void` | Layer removal event |
| `onResize` | `() => void` | Map resize event |
| `onRightClick` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Right-click event |
| `onSingleTap` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Single tap event |
| `onTouchEnd` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | touch end event |
| `onTouchMove` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | touch move event |
| `onTouchStart` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | touch start event |
| `onTwoFingerTap` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Two finger tap event |
| `onWheel` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Wheel Event |
| `onZoomChanged` | `(zoom: number) => void` | Zoom level change event |
| `onZooming` | `() => void` | Zoom animation progress event |
| `onZoomStart` | `() => void` | Zoom animation start event |

## Ref method

```tsx
import { useRef } from "react";
import { NaverMap, type NaverMapRef } from "react-naver-maps-kit";

function RefExample() {
  const mapRef = useRef<NaverMapRef>(null);

  return (
    <>
      <button onClick={() => mapRef.current?.panTo({ lat: 37.5666, lng: 126.9784 })}>
Go to Seoul City Hall
      </button>
      <NaverMap ref={mapRef} zoom={10} style={{ width: 480, height: 320 }} />
    </>
  );
}
```

### Ref method details

| Method                   | Signature                                                                                                                              | Description                             |
| ------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- |
| `getInstance` | `() => naver.maps.Map \| null` | Returns an internal map instance.        |
| `addOverlayPane` | `(name: string, elementOrZIndex: HTMLElement \| number) => void` | Add an overlay pane.             |
| `addPane` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["addPane"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["addPane"]> \| undefined` | Add a custom pane.          |
| `removeOverlayPane` | `(name: string) => void` | Removes the overlay pane.             |
| `removePane` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["removePane"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["removePane"]> \| undefined` | Removes a custom pane.          |
| `autoResize` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["autoResize"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["autoResize"]> \| undefined` | Automatically resizes the map.          |
| `destroy` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["destroy"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["destroy"]> \| undefined` | Clean up your map instance.             |
| `refresh` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["refresh"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["refresh"]> \| undefined` | Refreshes tile/render state.         |
| `stop` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["stop"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["stop"]> \| undefined` | Stops an ongoing map animation. |
| `getBounds` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getBounds"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getBounds"]> \| undefined` | Returns the current map boundaries.            |
| `getCenter` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getCenter"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getCenter"]> \| undefined` | Returns the current centroid coordinates.            |
| `getCenterPoint` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getCenterPoint"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getCenterPoint"]> \| undefined` | Returns the current centroid world coordinates.       |
| `getElement` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getElement"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getElement"]> \| undefined` | Returns a map container DOM element.    |
| `getMapTypeId` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getMapTypeId"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getMapTypeId"]> \| undefined` | Returns the current map type ID.         |
| `getMaxZoom` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getMaxZoom"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getMaxZoom"]> \| undefined` | Returns the maximum zoom level.              |
| `getMinZoom` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getMinZoom"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getMinZoom"]> \| undefined` | Returns the minimum zoom level.              |
| `getOptions` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getOptions"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getOptions"]> \| undefined` | View map options.                 |
| `getPanes` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getPanes"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getPanes"]> \| undefined` | Returns a set of panes.                 |
| `getPrimitiveProjection` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getPrimitiveProjection"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getPrimitiveProjection"]> \| undefined` | Returns the original projection.           |
| `getProjection` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getProjection"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getProjection"]> \| undefined` | Returns a map projection.           |
| `getSize` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getSize"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getSize"]> \| undefined` | Returns the map size.                 |
| `getZoom` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["getZoom"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["getZoom"]> \| undefined` | Returns the current zoom level.              |
| `fitBounds` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["fitBounds"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["fitBounds"]> \| undefined` | Move the map to fit the specified boundary.     |
| `panBy` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["panBy"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["panBy"]> \| undefined` | Move the map by pixel offset. |
| `panTo` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["panTo"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["panTo"]> \| undefined` | Moves smoothly to specified coordinates.        |
| `panToBounds` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["panToBounds"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["panToBounds"]> \| undefined` | Move smoothly along the border.        |
| `morph` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["morph"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["morph"]> \| undefined` | Switch and move using coordinate/zoom combination.       |
| `updateBy` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["updateBy"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["updateBy"]> \| undefined` | Move immediately to coordinates/zoom.            |
| `zoomBy` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["zoomBy"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["zoomBy"]> \| undefined` | Change to relative zoom level.              |
| `setCenter` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["setCenter"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["setCenter"]> \| undefined` | Set the center coordinates.                 |
| `setCenterPoint` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["setCenterPoint"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["setCenterPoint"]> \| undefined` | Sets the center world coordinates.            |
| `setMapTypeId` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["setMapTypeId"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["setMapTypeId"]> \| undefined` | Set the map type ID.              |
| `setOptions` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["setOptions"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["setOptions"]> \| undefined` | Set map options.                 |
| `setSize` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["setSize"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["setSize"]> \| undefined` | Set the map size.                 |
| `setZoom` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Map["setZoom"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Map["setZoom"]> \| undefined` | Set the zoom level.                   |

## DOM properties

| Prop               | Type                                    | Description                                                                  |
| ------------------ | --------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Container common properties | `React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<"div">` | `id`, `className`, `style`, `role`, `tabIndex`, `data-*`, `aria-*` can be used |
| excluded properties | `children`, `draggable` | `children` excluded, `draggable` prevents name conflicts with map options |

## Behavior Rules

- When mounting, a map instance is created and duplicate creation is prevented.
- Only changed options are reflected after diff calculation.
- `center`, `zoom`, and `mapTypeId` are applied precisely as imperative APIs.
- When unmounting, it cleans up event listeners, calls destroy, and even initializes the container.
- `defaultCenter`/`defaultZoom` is an uncontrolled mode, which sets only the initial value and manages the internal state thereafter.
- `center`/`zoom` is controlled mode, synchronizing with React state.
- `fallback` is displayed during SDK loading (`loading`) or when an error occurs (`error`) when `suspense` is `false`.
- If `suspense` is `true`, a Promise is thrown before SDK preparation to use the `Suspense` fallback, and in an error state, an Error is thrown and delegated to the Error Boundary.

---

## Source File: api/marker.md

- URL: https://react-naver-maps-kit.pages.dev/api/marker
- Local Path: packages/docs/api/marker.md

# Marker

`Marker` is an overlay API that wraps `naver.maps.Marker` in a React component.

## public type

```ts
interface MarkerOverlayProps {
  map?: naver.maps.Map | null;
  position: naver.maps.Coord | naver.maps.CoordLiteral;
  icon?: string | naver.maps.ImageIcon | naver.maps.SymbolIcon | naver.maps.HtmlIcon;
  animation?: naver.maps.Animation;
  shape?: naver.maps.MarkerShape;
  title?: string;
  cursor?: string;
  clickable?: boolean;
  draggable?: boolean;
  visible?: boolean;
  zIndex?: number;
  collisionBehavior?: boolean;
  collisionBoxSize?: naver.maps.Size | naver.maps.SizeLiteral;

/** A unique ID that identifies the marker in the MarkerClusterer. If omitted, it will be automatically generated. */
  clustererItemId?: string | number;
/** Custom data to be accessed from onClusterClick callback */
  item?: unknown;
}

interface MarkerLifecycleProps {
  children?: React.ReactNode;
  onMarkerReady?: (marker: naver.maps.Marker) => void;
  onMarkerDestroy?: () => void;
  onMarkerError?: (error: Error) => void;
}

interface MarkerEventProps {
  onClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onDblClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onRightClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseDown?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseUp?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchStart?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchEnd?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onDragStart?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onDrag?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onDragEnd?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onClickableChanged?: (clickable: boolean) => void;
  onCursorChanged?: (cursor: string) => void;
  onDraggableChanged?: (draggable: boolean) => void;
  onIconChanged?: (
    icon: string | naver.maps.ImageIcon | naver.maps.SymbolIcon | naver.maps.HtmlIcon
  ) => void;
  onIconLoaded?: (marker: naver.maps.Marker) => void;
  onPositionChanged?: (position: naver.maps.Coord) => void;
  onShapeChanged?: (shape: naver.maps.MarkerShape) => void;
  onTitleChanged?: (title: string) => void;
  onVisibleChanged?: (visible: boolean) => void;
  onZIndexChanged?: (zIndex: number) => void;
}

export type MarkerProps = MarkerOverlayProps & MarkerLifecycleProps & MarkerEventProps;

export interface MarkerRef {
  getInstance: () => naver.maps.Marker | null;
  getAnimation: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getAnimation"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getAnimation"]> | undefined;
  getClickable: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getClickable"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getClickable"]> | undefined;
  getCursor: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getCursor"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getCursor"]> | undefined;
  getDraggable: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getDraggable"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getDraggable"]> | undefined;
  getDrawingRect: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getDrawingRect"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getDrawingRect"]> | undefined;
  getElement: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getElement"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getElement"]> | undefined;
  getIcon: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getIcon"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getIcon"]> | undefined;
  getMap: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getMap"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getMap"]> | undefined;
  getOptions: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getOptions"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getOptions"]> | undefined;
  getPanes: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getPanes"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getPanes"]> | undefined;
  getPosition: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getPosition"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getPosition"]> | undefined;
  getProjection: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getProjection"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getProjection"]> | undefined;
  getShape: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getShape"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getShape"]> | undefined;
  getTitle: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getTitle"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getTitle"]> | undefined;
  getVisible: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getVisible"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getVisible"]> | undefined;
  getZIndex: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getZIndex"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getZIndex"]> | undefined;
  setAnimation: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setAnimation"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setAnimation"]> | undefined;
  setClickable: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setClickable"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setClickable"]> | undefined;
  setCursor: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setCursor"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setCursor"]> | undefined;
  setDraggable: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setDraggable"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setDraggable"]> | undefined;
  setIcon: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setIcon"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setIcon"]> | undefined;
  setMap: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setMap"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setMap"]> | undefined;
  setOptions: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setOptions"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setOptions"]> | undefined;
  setPosition: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setPosition"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setPosition"]> | undefined;
  setShape: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setShape"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setShape"]> | undefined;
  setTitle: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setTitle"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setTitle"]> | undefined;
  setVisible: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setVisible"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setVisible"]> | undefined;
  setZIndex: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setZIndex"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setZIndex"]> | undefined;
}
```

## Option properties

| Prop                | Type                                                                             | Description                                                      |
| ------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `map` | `naver.maps.Map \| null` | The map instance to bind the marker to (if not specified, Provider map will be used) |
| `position` | `naver.maps.Coord \| naver.maps.CoordLiteral` | Marker coordinates (required) |
| `icon` | `string \| naver.maps.ImageIcon \| naver.maps.SymbolIcon \| naver.maps.HtmlIcon` | marker icon |
| `children` | `React.ReactNode` | HTML-based custom marker content |
| `animation` | `naver.maps.Animation` | marker animation |
| `shape` | `naver.maps.MarkerShape` | Marker interaction area |
| `title` | `string` | marker tooltip text |
| `cursor` | `string` | Hover cursor |
| `clickable` | `boolean` | Clickable |
| `draggable` | `boolean` | Draggable |
| `visible` | `boolean` | Visibility |
| `zIndex` | `number` | marker z-index |
| `collisionBehavior` | `boolean` | Whether to handle GL environment marker conflicts |
| `collisionBoxSize` | `naver.maps.Size \| naver.maps.SizeLiteral` | GL environment conflict handling box size |
| `clustererItemId` | `string \| number` | Marker identification ID when using `MarkerClusterer`. Automatically generated if omitted |
| `item` | `unknown` | Custom data to access in `onClusterClick` callback |

## Life cycle properties

| Prop              | Type                                  | Description             |
| ----------------- | ------------------------------------- | ----------------------- |
| `onMarkerReady` | `(marker: naver.maps.Marker) => void` | Instance creation completion callback |
| `onMarkerDestroy` | `() => void` | Instance cleanup complete callback |
| `onMarkerError` | `(error: Error) => void` | creation failure callback |

## Event properties

| Prop                 | Type                                                                                             | Description                  |
| -------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------- |
| `onClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Click event |
| `onDblClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Double click event |
| `onRightClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Right-click event |
| `onMouseDown` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | mouse down event |
| `onMouseUp` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | mouse up event |
| `onTouchStart` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | touch start event |
| `onTouchEnd` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | touch end event |
| `onDragStart` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | drag start event |
| `onDrag` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | drag event |
| `onDragEnd` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Drag end event |
| `onClickableChanged` | `(clickable: boolean) => void` | clickable change event |
| `onCursorChanged` | `(cursor: string) => void` | cursor change event |
| `onDraggableChanged` | `(draggable: boolean) => void` | draggable change event |
| `onIconChanged` | `(icon: string \| naver.maps.ImageIcon \| naver.maps.SymbolIcon \| naver.maps.HtmlIcon) => void` | icon change event |
| `onIconLoaded` | `(marker: naver.maps.Marker) => void` | Image icon Load completion event |
| `onPositionChanged` | `(position: naver.maps.Coord) => void` | position change event |
| `onShapeChanged` | `(shape: naver.maps.MarkerShape) => void` | shape change event |
| `onTitleChanged` | `(title: string) => void` | title change event |
| `onVisibleChanged` | `(visible: boolean) => void` | visible change event |
| `onZIndexChanged` | `(zIndex: number) => void` | zIndex change event |

## Ref method

| Method           | Signature                                                                                                                    | Description                         |
| ---------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------- |
| `getInstance` | `() => naver.maps.Marker \| null` | Returns an internal marker instance.    |
| `getAnimation` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getAnimation"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getAnimation"]> \| undefined` | Returns the current animation.       |
| `getClickable` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getClickable"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getClickable"]> \| undefined` | Returns a clickable state.        |
| `getCursor` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getCursor"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getCursor"]> \| undefined` | Returns the cursor settings.           |
| `getDraggable` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getDraggable"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getDraggable"]> \| undefined` | Returns the draggable state.        |
| `getDrawingRect` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getDrawingRect"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getDrawingRect"]> \| undefined` | Returns the marker drawing boundary area. |
| `getElement` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getElement"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getElement"]> \| undefined` | Returns the marker DOM element.         |
| `getIcon` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getIcon"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getIcon"]> \| undefined` | icon Returns the setting.             |
| `getMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getMap"]> \| undefined` | Returns the bound map.          |
| `getOptions` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getOptions"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getOptions"]> \| undefined` | Returns the marker option.           |
| `getPanes` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getPanes"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getPanes"]> \| undefined` | Returns map panes.             |
| `getPosition` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getPosition"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getPosition"]> \| undefined` | Returns coordinates.                  |
| `getProjection` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getProjection"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getProjection"]> \| undefined` | Returns projection.            |
| `getShape` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getShape"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getShape"]> \| undefined` | Returns shape.                 |
| `getTitle` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getTitle"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getTitle"]> \| undefined` | Returns title.                 |
| `getVisible` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getVisible"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getVisible"]> \| undefined` | Returns the visible state.          |
| `getZIndex` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["getZIndex"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["getZIndex"]> \| undefined` | Returns zIndex.                |
| `setAnimation` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setAnimation"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setAnimation"]> \| undefined` | Set animation.             |
| `setClickable` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setClickable"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setClickable"]> \| undefined` | Set clickable.             |
| `setCursor` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setCursor"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setCursor"]> \| undefined` | Set the cursor.                |
| `setDraggable` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setDraggable"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setDraggable"]> \| undefined` | Set draggable.             |
| `setIcon` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setIcon"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setIcon"]> \| undefined` | Set the icon.                  |
| `setMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setMap"]> \| undefined` | Set up a map binding.            |
| `setOptions` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setOptions"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setOptions"]> \| undefined` | Set marker options.           |
| `setPosition` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setPosition"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setPosition"]> \| undefined` | Set the coordinates.                  |
| `setShape` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setShape"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setShape"]> \| undefined` | Set the shape.                 |
| `setTitle` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setTitle"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setTitle"]> \| undefined` | Set the title.                 |
| `setVisible` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setVisible"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setVisible"]> \| undefined` | Set visible.               |
| `setZIndex` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Marker["setZIndex"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Marker["setZIndex"]> \| undefined` | Set zIndex.                |

## Behavior Rules

- If there are `children`, render them as HTML icons (`content`).
- If `icon` and `children` are passed at the same time, `children` content is used first and `anchor`/`size` of `icon` is reflected.
- Cleans up marker listeners and performs `setMap(null)` when unmounting.
- If the `map` prop is not specified, the nearest instance of `NaverMap` or `Panorama` is automatically used.

---

## Source File: api/marker-clusterer.md

- URL: https://react-naver-maps-kit.pages.dev/api/marker-clusterer
- Local Path: packages/docs/api/marker-clusterer.md

# MarkerClusterer

`MarkerClusterer` is a component that automatically clusters multiple `<Marker>`.
Register marker data in the internal registry and render clusters recalculated according to map events.

## How it works

1. `<Marker>` does not create a marker directly inside `<MarkerClusterer>`, but registers location data in the internal registry.
2. `MarkerClusterer` recalculates clusters based on the current zoom/viewport when a map event (`idle`, `move`, `zoom`) occurs.
3. Cluster markers are rendered with `<Marker>` JSX, and the `clusterIcon` prop is passed to children.
4. Single points that are not included in a cluster are displayed on the map as the children (custom overlay) of the original `<Marker>`.

## public type

```ts
// Latitude/Longitude pure object (avoiding naver.maps.LatLngLiteral union problem)
interface LatLngLiteral {
  readonly lat: number;
  readonly lng: number;
}

// map area pure object
interface LatLngBoundsLiteral {
  readonly south: number;
  readonly west: number;
  readonly north: number;
  readonly east: number;
}

// Data records that Marker registers in the clusterer registry
interface ItemRecord<TData> {
  readonly id: string | number;
  readonly position: LatLngLiteral;
  readonly data: TData;
  readonly markerOptions?: Readonly<Partial<naver.maps.MarkerOptions>>;
}

// per cluster
interface Cluster<TData> {
  readonly id: string;
  readonly position: LatLngLiteral;
  readonly count: number;
  readonly bounds?: LatLngBoundsLiteral;
  readonly items?: readonly ItemRecord<TData>[];
}

// Current map context passed to algorithm.cluster()
interface AlgorithmContext {
  readonly zoom: number;
  readonly bounds: LatLngBoundsLiteral;
}

// Custom algorithm interface
interface ClusterAlgorithm<TData> {
  cluster(
    items: readonly ItemRecord<TData>[],
    ctx: AlgorithmContext
  ): {
    readonly clusters: readonly Cluster<TData>[];
    readonly points: readonly ItemRecord<TData>[];
  };
  setOptions?(options: unknown): void;
  destroy?(): void;
}

// Built-in algorithm settings
type BuiltInAlgorithmConfig =
  | { type: "grid"; gridSize?: number; minClusterSize?: number; maxZoom?: number }
  | { type: "radius"; radius?: number; minClusterSize?: number; maxZoom?: number }
  | {
      type: "supercluster";
      radius?: number;
      minZoom?: number;
      maxZoom?: number;
      extent?: number;
      nodeSize?: number;
    };

// Cluster icon renderer
type ClusterIconRenderer<TData> = (args: {
  readonly cluster: Cluster<TData>;
  readonly count: number;
}) => React.ReactNode;

// Helper provided in onClusterClick callback
interface MarkerClustererHelpers<TData> {
  zoomToCluster(
    cluster: Cluster<TData>,
    options?: { readonly padding?: number; readonly maxZoom?: number }
  ): void;
  fitBounds(bounds: LatLngBoundsLiteral, options?: { readonly padding?: number }): void;
}

interface MarkerClustererProps<TData> {
  algorithm?: BuiltInAlgorithmConfig | ClusterAlgorithm<TData>;
  clusterIcon?: ClusterIconRenderer<TData>;
  onClusterClick?: (args: {
    cluster: Cluster<TData>;
    helpers: MarkerClustererHelpers<TData>;
  }) => void;
  behavior?: {
    recomputeOn?: "idle" | "move" | "zoom";
    debounceMs?: number;
  };
  clusterData?: {
    includeItems?: boolean;
    maxItemsInCluster?: number;
  };
  enabled?: boolean;
  children: React.ReactNode;
}
```

## Props

| Prop             | Type                                            | Default                                    | Description                                      |
| ---------------- | ----------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------ |
| `algorithm` | `BuiltInAlgorithmConfig \| ClusterAlgorithm<T>` | `{ type: "supercluster", radius: 60 }` | Clustering Algorithm |
| `clusterIcon` | `ClusterIconRenderer<T>` | Blue circular basic icon | Cluster Marker Icon Renderer |
| `onClusterClick` | `(args) => void` | — | Cluster marker click callback |
| `behavior` | `{ recomputeOn?, debounceMs? }` | `{ recomputeOn: "idle", debounceMs: 200 }` | Setting up recalculation trigger and debounce |
| `clusterData` | `{ includeItems?, maxItemsInCluster? }` | `{ includeItems: true }` | Data options to include in cluster object |
| `enabled` | `boolean` | `true` | If `false`, disable clustering, render as individual markers |
| `children` | `React.ReactNode` | — | `<Marker>` components to be registered in the clusterer (required) |

### `algorithm` — Built-in algorithm options

| type | Options | Description |
| ---------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"supercluster"` | `radius`, `minZoom`, `maxZoom`, `extent`, `nodeSize` | Based on [Supercluster](https://github.com/mapbox/supercluster) (default) |
| `"grid"` | `gridSize`, `minClusterSize`, `maxZoom` | grid cell based |
| `"radius"` | `radius`, `minClusterSize`, `maxZoom` | center point-distance based |

### `behavior` options

| Options | default | Description |
| ------------- | -------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `recomputeOn` | `"idle"` | `"idle"` / `"move"` / `"zoom"` — The map event that will trigger the recalculation |
| `debounceMs` | `200` | Recalculation Debounce Latency (ms) |

### `clusterData` options

| Options | default | Description |
| ------------------- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------- |
| `includeItems` | `true` | Whether to include an array of marker records in `cluster.items` |
| `maxItemsInCluster` | None | Maximum number of markers to include in `cluster.items`. If omitted, include all |

## Helper method

Can be used in the second argument `helpers` of the `onClusterClick` callback.

| method | Description |
| ---------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- |
| `zoomToCluster(cluster, options?)` | Adjust the map viewport so that all of the cluster's markers are visible. |
| `fitBounds(bounds, options?)` | Adjusts the map viewport to fit the specified area on the screen.       |

`zoomToCluster` options:

| Options | Description |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------- |
| `padding` | bounds padding (percent) |
| `maxZoom` | Limits the zoom if it is greater than this zoom after fitBounds |

## Example usage

### Basic usage

```tsx
import { NaverMap, Marker, MarkerClusterer } from "react-naver-maps-kit";

const points = [
  { id: 1, lat: 37.5666, lng: 126.9784 },
  { id: 2, lat: 37.57, lng: 126.982 }
  // ...
];

function MyMap() {
  return (
    <NaverMap defaultCenter={{ lat: 37.5666, lng: 126.9784 }} defaultZoom={12}>
      <MarkerClusterer>
        {points.map((p) => (
          <Marker key={p.id} position={{ lat: p.lat, lng: p.lng }} />
        ))}
      </MarkerClusterer>
    </NaverMap>
  );
}
```

### Custom cluster icon

```tsx
<MarkerClusterer
  clusterIcon={({ count }) => (
    <div
      style={{
        width: 40,
        height: 40,
        borderRadius: "50%",
        background: "#EA4335",
        color: "#fff",
        display: "flex",
        alignItems: "center",
        justifyContent: "center",
        fontWeight: "bold"
      }}
    >
      {count}
    </div>
  )}
>
  ...
</MarkerClusterer>
```

### Cluster click handler

```tsx
<MarkerClusterer
  clusterData={{ includeItems: true }}
  onClusterClick={({ cluster, helpers }) => {
console.log("Number of cluster markers:", cluster.count);
console.log("Items included:", cluster.items);

// Zoom in to the cluster area (maximum zoom limited to 16)
    helpers.zoomToCluster(cluster, { maxZoom: 16 });
  }}
>
  ...
</MarkerClusterer>
```

### Algorithm changes

```tsx
// Grid algorithm
<MarkerClusterer algorithm={{ type: "grid", gridSize: 80 }}>
  ...
</MarkerClusterer>

// Radius algorithm
<MarkerClusterer algorithm={{ type: "radius", radius: 100, minClusterSize: 3 }}>
  ...
</MarkerClusterer>

// Supercluster (detailed settings)
<MarkerClusterer algorithm={{ type: "supercluster", radius: 40, maxZoom: 14 }}>
  ...
</MarkerClusterer>
```

### Custom Algorithm

You can directly inject algorithms by implementing the `ClusterAlgorithm<TData>` interface.

```tsx
import type { ClusterAlgorithm, AlgorithmContext, ItemRecord, Cluster } from "react-naver-maps-kit";

class MyAlgorithm<TData> implements ClusterAlgorithm<TData> {
  cluster(items: readonly ItemRecord<TData>[], ctx: AlgorithmContext) {
// custom clustering logic
    return { clusters: [] as Cluster<TData>[], points: [...items] };
  }
}

<MarkerClusterer algorithm={new MyAlgorithm()}>...</MarkerClusterer>;
```

### Custom marker icon (children)

You can use custom HTML overlays on standalone points. Markers that are not included in a cluster are displayed as children.

```tsx
<MarkerClusterer
  clusterIcon={({ count }) => (
    <div
      style={
        {
/* Cluster style */
        }
      }
    >
      {count}
    </div>
  )}
>
  {points.map((p) => (
    <Marker key={p.id} position={p.position}>
{/* Custom marker to display when it is a single point */}
      <div
        style={{
          width: 32,
          height: 32,
          borderRadius: "50%",
          background: "#03C75A",
          border: "2px solid white",
          boxShadow: "0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)"
        }}
      />
    </Marker>
  ))}
</MarkerClusterer>
```

### Clustering toggle (`enabled`)

```tsx
const [clustering, setClustering] = useState(true);

<>
  <button onClick={() => setClustering((v) => !v)}>
{clustering ? "Turn off clustering" : "Turn on clustering"}
  </button>

  <NaverMap ...>
    <MarkerClusterer enabled={clustering}>
      {points.map((p) => (
        <Marker key={p.id} position={p.position} />
      ))}
    </MarkerClusterer>
  </NaverMap>
</>
```

If `enabled={false}`, clustering is turned off and each `<Marker>` is rendered as an individual `naver.maps.Marker`.

## Clusterer integration in Marker

Additional props used when `<Marker>` operates inside `<MarkerClusterer>`.

| Prop              | Type               | Description                                                          |
| ----------------- | ------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `clustererItemId` | `string \| number` | A unique ID that identifies the marker. If omitted, it will be automatically generated with React `useId()`. |
| `item` | `TData` | Custom data to be accessed in cluster callback (`onClusterClick`) |

## Behavior Rules

- `<MarkerClusterer>` must be located inside `<NaverMap>`.
- If `clustererItemId` is not specified in `<Marker>`, the ID automatically generated with `useId()` is used.
- `<Marker>` contained in a cluster is hidden from the map, and standalone points are displayed with their children (custom overlay).
- Switching to `enabled={false}` turns off clustering and causes all `<Marker>` to be rendered as individual markers.

---

## Source File: api/info-window.md

- URL: https://react-naver-maps-kit.pages.dev/api/info-window
- Local Path: packages/docs/api/info-window.md

# InfoWindow

`InfoWindow` is an overlay API that wraps `naver.maps.InfoWindow` in React components.

## public type

```ts
interface InfoWindowOptionProps {
  position?: naver.maps.Coord | naver.maps.CoordLiteral;
  content?: string | HTMLElement;
  zIndex?: number;
  maxWidth?: number;
  pixelOffset?: naver.maps.Point | naver.maps.PointLiteral;
  backgroundColor?: string;
  borderColor?: string;
  borderWidth?: number;
  disableAutoPan?: boolean;
  disableAnchor?: boolean;
  anchorSkew?: boolean;
  anchorSize?: naver.maps.Size | naver.maps.SizeLiteral;
  anchorColor?: string;
  autoPanPadding?: naver.maps.Point | naver.maps.PointLiteral;
}

interface InfoWindowLifecycleProps {
  anchor?: naver.maps.Coord | naver.maps.CoordLiteral | naver.maps.Marker;
  visible?: boolean;
  children?: React.ReactNode;
  onInfoWindowReady?: (infoWindow: naver.maps.InfoWindow) => void;
  onInfoWindowDestroy?: () => void;
  onInfoWindowError?: (error: Error) => void;
}

interface InfoWindowEventProps {
  onOpen?: (pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onClose?: (pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onAnchorColorChanged?: (anchorColor: string) => void;
  onAnchorSizeChanged?: (anchorSize: naver.maps.Size) => void;
  onAnchorSkewChanged?: (anchorSkew: boolean) => void;
  onBackgroundColorChanged?: (backgroundColor: string) => void;
  onBorderColorChanged?: (borderColor: string) => void;
  onBorderWidthChanged?: (borderWidth: number) => void;
  onContentChanged?: (content: string | HTMLElement) => void;
  onDisableAnchorChanged?: (disableAnchor: boolean) => void;
  onDisableAutoPanChanged?: (disableAutoPan: boolean) => void;
  onMaxWidthChanged?: (maxWidth: number) => void;
  onPixelOffsetChanged?: (pixelOffset: naver.maps.Point) => void;
  onPositionChanged?: (position: naver.maps.Coord) => void;
  onZIndexChanged?: (zIndex: number) => void;
}

export type InfoWindowProps = InfoWindowOptionProps &
  InfoWindowLifecycleProps &
  InfoWindowEventProps;

export interface InfoWindowRef {
  getInstance: () => naver.maps.InfoWindow | null;
  close: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["close"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["close"]> | undefined;
  getContent: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getContent"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getContent"]> | undefined;
  getContentElement: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getContentElement"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getContentElement"]> | undefined;
  getMap: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getMap"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getMap"]> | undefined;
  getOptions: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getOptions"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getOptions"]> | undefined;
  getPanes: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getPanes"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getPanes"]> | undefined;
  getPosition: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getPosition"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getPosition"]> | undefined;
  getProjection: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getProjection"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getProjection"]> | undefined;
  getZIndex: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getZIndex"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getZIndex"]> | undefined;
  open: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["open"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["open"]> | undefined;
  setContent: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setContent"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setContent"]> | undefined;
  setMap: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setMap"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setMap"]> | undefined;
  setOptions: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setOptions"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setOptions"]> | undefined;
  setPosition: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setPosition"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setPosition"]> | undefined;
  setZIndex: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setZIndex"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setZIndex"]> | undefined;
}
```

## Option properties

| Prop              | Type                                                               | Description               |
| ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------- |
| `position` | `naver.maps.Coord \| naver.maps.CoordLiteral` | Info window location |
| `content` | `string \| HTMLElement` | Info Window Contents |
| `children` | `React.ReactNode` | React-based content |
| `anchor` | `naver.maps.Coord \| naver.maps.CoordLiteral \| naver.maps.Marker` | info window anchor |
| `visible` | `boolean` | visibility (`true` default) |
| `zIndex` | `number` | Stacking order |
| `maxWidth` | `number` | max width (px) |
| `pixelOffset` | `naver.maps.Point \| naver.maps.PointLiteral` | tail offset |
| `backgroundColor` | `string` | background color |
| `borderColor` | `string` | border color |
| `borderWidth` | `number` | border thickness |
| `disableAutoPan` | `boolean` | Disable auto panning |
| `disableAnchor` | `boolean` | Disable tail |
| `anchorSkew` | `boolean` | Activate tail tilt |
| `anchorSize` | `naver.maps.Size \| naver.maps.SizeLiteral` | tail size |
| `anchorColor` | `string` | tail color |
| `autoPanPadding` | `naver.maps.Point \| naver.maps.PointLiteral` | Auto Panning Margin |

## Life cycle properties

| Prop                  | Type                                          | Description             |
| --------------------- | --------------------------------------------- | ----------------------- |
| `onInfoWindowReady` | `(infoWindow: naver.maps.InfoWindow) => void` | Instance creation completion callback |
| `onInfoWindowDestroy` | `() => void` | Instance cleanup complete callback |
| `onInfoWindowError` | `(error: Error) => void` | creation failure callback |

## Event properties

| Prop                       | Type                                              | Description                  |
| -------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------- |
| `onOpen` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Information Window Open Event |
| `onClose` | `(pointerEvent: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Information Window Closed Event |
| `onAnchorColorChanged` | `(anchorColor: string) => void` | Tail color change event |
| `onAnchorSizeChanged` | `(anchorSize: naver.maps.Size) => void` | Tail size change event |
| `onAnchorSkewChanged` | `(anchorSkew: boolean) => void` | Tail tilt option change event |
| `onBackgroundColorChanged` | `(backgroundColor: string) => void` | Background color change event |
| `onBorderColorChanged` | `(borderColor: string) => void` | Border color change event |
| `onBorderWidthChanged` | `(borderWidth: number) => void` | Border thickness change event |
| `onContentChanged` | `(content: string \| HTMLElement) => void` | Content change event |
| `onDisableAnchorChanged` | `(disableAnchor: boolean) => void` | Tail usage option change event |
| `onDisableAutoPanChanged` | `(disableAutoPan: boolean) => void` | Auto panning option change event |
| `onMaxWidthChanged` | `(maxWidth: number) => void` | max width change event |
| `onPixelOffsetChanged` | `(pixelOffset: naver.maps.Point) => void` | Pixel offset change event |
| `onPositionChanged` | `(position: naver.maps.Coord) => void` | Location change event |
| `onZIndexChanged` | `(zIndex: number) => void` | zIndex change event |

## Ref method

| Method              | Signature                                                                                                                                  | Description        |
| ------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------ |
| `getInstance` | `() => naver.maps.InfoWindow \| null` | return internal instance |
| `close` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["close"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["close"]> \| undefined` | Close information window |
| `getContent` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getContent"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getContent"]> \| undefined` | Content View |
| `getContentElement` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getContentElement"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getContentElement"]> \| undefined` | Content DOM lookup |
| `getMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getMap"]> \| undefined` | map query |
| `getOptions` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getOptions"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getOptions"]> \| undefined` | Option inquiry |
| `getPanes` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getPanes"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getPanes"]> \| undefined` | panes query |
| `getPosition` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getPosition"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getPosition"]> \| undefined` | Location inquiry |
| `getProjection` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getProjection"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getProjection"]> \| undefined` | projection query |
| `getZIndex` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getZIndex"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["getZIndex"]> \| undefined` | zIndex lookup |
| `open` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["open"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["open"]> \| undefined` | Open information window |
| `setContent` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setContent"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setContent"]> \| undefined` | Content Settings |
| `setMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setMap"]> \| undefined` | map settings |
| `setOptions` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setOptions"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setOptions"]> \| undefined` | Option Settings |
| `setPosition` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setPosition"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setPosition"]> \| undefined` | Location Settings |
| `setZIndex` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setZIndex"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.InfoWindow["setZIndex"]> \| undefined` | zIndex Settings |

## Behavior Rules

- If there are `children`, React content is used first instead of `content`.
- When `visible` is `true`, it opens based on `anchor` or `position`.
- When unmounting, perform `close()` and `setMap(null)` after cleaning up the listener.
- If the `map` prop is not specified, the nearest instance of `NaverMap` or `Panorama` is automatically used.

---

## Source File: api/polyline.md

- URL: https://react-naver-maps-kit.pages.dev/api/polyline
- Local Path: packages/docs/api/polyline.md

# Polyline

`Polyline` is an overlay API that wraps `naver.maps.Polyline` in a React component.

## public type

```ts
interface PolylineOptionProps {
  map?: naver.maps.Map | null;
  path: naver.maps.ArrayOfCoords | naver.maps.KVOArrayOfCoords | naver.maps.ArrayOfCoordsLiteral;
  strokeWeight?: number;
  strokeOpacity?: number;
  strokeColor?: string;
  strokeStyle?: naver.maps.StrokeStyleType;
  strokeLineCap?: naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType;
  strokeLineJoin?: naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType;
  clickable?: boolean;
  visible?: boolean;
  zIndex?: number;
  startIcon?: naver.maps.PointingIcon;
  startIconSize?: number;
  endIcon?: naver.maps.PointingIcon;
  endIconSize?: number;
}

interface PolylineLifecycleProps {
  onPolylineReady?: (polyline: naver.maps.Polyline) => void;
  onPolylineDestroy?: () => void;
  onPolylineError?: (error: Error) => void;
}

interface PolylineEventProps {
  onClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onDblClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseDown?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseMove?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOut?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOver?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseUp?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onRightClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchStart?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchMove?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchEnd?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onClickableChanged?: (clickable: boolean) => void;
  onEndIconChanged?: (icon: naver.maps.PointingIcon) => void;
  onEndIconSizeChanged?: (size: number) => void;
  onMapChanged?: (map: naver.maps.Map | null) => void;
  onPathChanged?: (
    path: naver.maps.ArrayOfCoords | naver.maps.KVOArrayOfCoords | naver.maps.ArrayOfCoordsLiteral
  ) => void;
  onStartIconChanged?: (icon: naver.maps.PointingIcon) => void;
  onStartIconSizeChanged?: (size: number) => void;
  onStrokeColorChanged?: (strokeColor: string) => void;
  onStrokeLineCapChanged?: (strokeLineCap: naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType) => void;
  onStrokeLineJoinChanged?: (strokeLineJoin: naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType) => void;
  onStrokeOpacityChanged?: (strokeOpacity: number) => void;
  onStrokeStyleChanged?: (strokeStyle: naver.maps.StrokeStyleType) => void;
  onStrokeWeightChanged?: (strokeWeight: number) => void;
  onVisibleChanged?: (visible: boolean) => void;
  onZIndexChanged?: (zIndex: number) => void;
}

export type PolylineProps = PolylineOptionProps & PolylineLifecycleProps & PolylineEventProps;
```

## Option properties

| Prop             | Type                                                        | Default      | Description                                                     |
| ---------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | ------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `map` | `naver.maps.Map \| null` | - | Map instance to bind the polyline to (if not specified, use Provider map) |
| `path` | `ArrayOfCoords\| KVOArrayOfCoords \| ArrayOfCoordsLiteral` | - (required) | polyline path coordinates |
| `strokeWeight` | `number` | - | Outline Thickness |
| `strokeOpacity` | `number` | - | Outline opacity (`0~1`) |
| `strokeColor` | `string` | - | Outline color (CSS color) |
| `strokeStyle` | `naver.maps.StrokeStyleType` | - | Outline Style |
| `strokeLineCap` | `naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType` | - | Outline end closure style |
| `strokeLineJoin` | `naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType` | - | Outline joint closure style |
| `clickable` | `boolean` | - | Whether to receive click/pointer events |
| `visible` | `boolean` | - | Exposure |
| `zIndex` | `number` | - | Stacking order |
| `startIcon` | `naver.maps.PointingIcon` | - | Line start point icon |
| `startIconSize` | `number` | - | Starting point icon size |
| `endIcon` | `naver.maps.PointingIcon` | - | Line endpoint icon |
| `endIconSize` | `number` | - | Endpoint Icon Size |

## Life cycle properties

| Prop                | Type                                      | Description                |
| ------------------- | ----------------------------------------- | -------------------------- |
| `onPolylineReady` | `(polyline: naver.maps.Polyline) => void` | Called when instance creation is complete |
| `onPolylineDestroy` | `() => void` | Called when instance cleanup is complete |
| `onPolylineError` | `(error: Error) => void` | Called when instance creation fails |

## Event properties

| Prop                      | Type                                                                                                         | Description                             |
| ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------- |
| `onClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when polyline is clicked |
| `onDblClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when double-clicking a polyline |
| `onMouseDown` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse button is down |
| `onMouseMove` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse moves |
| `onMouseOut` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when the pointer goes outside the polyline |
| `onMouseOver` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when the pointer enters a polyline |
| `onMouseUp` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse button up |
| `onRightClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when right-clicking |
| `onTouchStart` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called on touch start |
| `onTouchMove` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called on touch movement |
| `onTouchEnd` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when touch ends |
| `onClickableChanged` | `(clickable: boolean) => void` | Called when clickability changes |
| `onEndIconChanged` | `(icon: naver.maps.PointingIcon) => void` | Called when the end icon changes |
| `onEndIconSizeChanged` | `(size: number) => void` | Called when the end icon size changes |
| `onMapChanged` | `(map: naver.maps.Map \| null) => void` | Called when the bound map changes |
| `onPathChanged` | `(path: naver.maps.ArrayOfCoords \| naver.maps.KVOArrayOfCoords \| naver.maps.ArrayOfCoordsLiteral) => void` | Called when path changes |
| `onStartIconChanged` | `(icon: naver.maps.PointingIcon) => void` | Called when the start icon changes |
| `onStartIconSizeChanged` | `(size: number) => void` | Called when the start icon size changes |
| `onStrokeColorChanged` | `(strokeColor: string) => void` | Called when the outline color changes |
| `onStrokeLineCapChanged` | `(strokeLineCap: naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType) => void` | Called when outline end closure changes |
| `onStrokeLineJoinChanged` | `(strokeLineJoin: naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType) => void` | Called when the finish of the outline connection is changed |
| `onStrokeOpacityChanged` | `(strokeOpacity: number) => void` | Called when outline opacity changes |
| `onStrokeStyleChanged` | `(strokeStyle: naver.maps.StrokeStyleType) => void` | Called when outline style changes |
| `onStrokeWeightChanged` | `(strokeWeight: number) => void` | Called when outline thickness changes |
| `onVisibleChanged` | `(visible: boolean) => void` | Called when exposure is changed |
| `onZIndexChanged` | `(zIndex: number) => void` | Called when stacking order is changed |

## Ref method

| Method           | Signature                                                                                                                        | Description                     |
| ---------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| `getInstance` | `() => naver.maps.Polyline \| null` | Returns an internal `Polyline` instance |
| `getBounds` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["getBounds"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["getBounds"]> \| undefined` | coordinate boundary query |
| `getClickable` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["getClickable"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["getClickable"]> \| undefined` | Clickability check |
| `getDistance` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["getDistance"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["getDistance"]> \| undefined` | Distance (meters) query |
| `getDrawingRect` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["getDrawingRect"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["getDrawingRect"]> \| undefined` | Rendering boundary query |
| `getElement` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["getElement"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["getElement"]> \| undefined` | DOM Element Lookup |
| `getMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["getMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["getMap"]> \| undefined` | Binding map query |
| `getOptions` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["getOptions"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["getOptions"]> \| undefined` | Option inquiry |
| `getPanes` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["getPanes"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["getPanes"]> \| undefined` | panes query |
| `getPath` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["getPath"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["getPath"]> \| undefined` | path query |
| `getProjection` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["getProjection"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["getProjection"]> \| undefined` | projection query |
| `getStyles` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["getStyles"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["getStyles"]> \| undefined` | Style Lookup |
| `getVisible` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["getVisible"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["getVisible"]> \| undefined` | Check exposure |
| `getZIndex` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["getZIndex"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["getZIndex"]> \| undefined` | zIndex lookup |
| `setClickable` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["setClickable"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["setClickable"]> \| undefined` | Set clickability |
| `setMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["setMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["setMap"]> \| undefined` | map bind/unbind |
| `setOptions` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["setOptions"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["setOptions"]> \| undefined` | Option batch/partial settings |
| `setPath` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["setPath"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["setPath"]> \| undefined` | path settings |
| `setStyles` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["setStyles"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["setStyles"]> \| undefined` | Style batch/partial settings |
| `setVisible` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["setVisible"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["setVisible"]> \| undefined` | Exposure settings |
| `setZIndex` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polyline["setZIndex"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polyline["setZIndex"]> \| undefined` | zIndex Settings |

## Behavior Rules

- When unmounting a component, call `setMap(null)` after cleaning up event listeners.
- If the `map` prop is not specified, the nearest instance of `NaverMap` or `Panorama` is automatically used.

---

## Source File: api/polygon.md

- URL: https://react-naver-maps-kit.pages.dev/api/polygon
- Local Path: packages/docs/api/polygon.md

# Polygon

`Polygon` is an overlay API that wraps `naver.maps.Polygon` in React components.

## public type

```ts
interface PolygonOptionProps {
  map?: naver.maps.Map | null;
  paths:
    | naver.maps.ArrayOfCoords[]
    | naver.maps.KVOArray<naver.maps.KVOArrayOfCoords>
    | naver.maps.ArrayOfCoordsLiteral[];
  strokeWeight?: number;
  strokeOpacity?: number;
  strokeColor?: string;
  strokeStyle?: naver.maps.StrokeStyleType;
  strokeLineCap?: naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType;
  strokeLineJoin?: naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType;
  fillColor?: string;
  fillOpacity?: number;
  clickable?: boolean;
  visible?: boolean;
  zIndex?: number;
}

interface PolygonLifecycleProps {
  onPolygonReady?: (polygon: naver.maps.Polygon) => void;
  onPolygonDestroy?: () => void;
  onPolygonError?: (error: Error) => void;
}

interface PolygonEventProps {
  onClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onDblClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseDown?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseMove?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOut?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOver?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseUp?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onRightClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchStart?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchMove?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchEnd?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onClickableChanged?: (clickable: boolean) => void;
  onFillColorChanged?: (fillColor: string) => void;
  onFillOpacityChanged?: (fillOpacity: number) => void;
  onMapChanged?: (map: naver.maps.Map | null) => void;
  onPathChanged?: (
    path: naver.maps.ArrayOfCoords | naver.maps.KVOArrayOfCoords | naver.maps.ArrayOfCoordsLiteral
  ) => void;
  onPathsChanged?: (
    paths:
      | naver.maps.ArrayOfCoords[]
      | naver.maps.KVOArray<naver.maps.KVOArrayOfCoords>
      | naver.maps.ArrayOfCoordsLiteral[]
  ) => void;
  onStrokeColorChanged?: (strokeColor: string) => void;
  onStrokeLineCapChanged?: (strokeLineCap: naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType) => void;
  onStrokeLineJoinChanged?: (strokeLineJoin: naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType) => void;
  onStrokeOpacityChanged?: (strokeOpacity: number) => void;
  onStrokeStyleChanged?: (strokeStyle: naver.maps.StrokeStyleType) => void;
  onStrokeWeightChanged?: (strokeWeight: number) => void;
  onVisibleChanged?: (visible: boolean) => void;
  onZIndexChanged?: (zIndex: number) => void;
}

export type PolygonProps = PolygonOptionProps & PolygonLifecycleProps & PolygonEventProps;
```

## Option properties

| Prop             | Type                                                                      | Default      | Description                                                   |
| ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `map` | `naver.maps.Map \| null` | - | Map instance to bind the polygon to (if not specified, use Provider map) |
| `paths` | `ArrayOfCoords[] \| KVOArray<KVOArrayOfCoords> \| ArrayOfCoordsLiteral[]` | - (required) | polygon vertex path array |
| `strokeWeight` | `number` | - | Outline Thickness |
| `strokeOpacity` | `number` | - | Outline Opacity (`0~1`) |
| `strokeColor` | `string` | - | Outline color (CSS color) |
| `strokeStyle` | `naver.maps.StrokeStyleType` | - | Outline Style |
| `strokeLineCap` | `naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType` | - | Outline end closure style |
| `strokeLineJoin` | `naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType` | - | Outline joint closure style |
| `fillColor` | `string` | - | Internal fill color (CSS color) |
| `fillOpacity` | `number` | - | Inner Fill Opacity (`0~1`) |
| `clickable` | `boolean` | - | Whether to receive click/pointer events |
| `visible` | `boolean` | - | Exposure |
| `zIndex` | `number` | - | Stacking order |

## Life cycle properties

| Prop               | Type                                    | Description                |
| ------------------ | --------------------------------------- | -------------------------- |
| `onPolygonReady` | `(polygon: naver.maps.Polygon) => void` | Called when instance creation is complete |
| `onPolygonDestroy` | `() => void` | Called when instance cleanup is complete |
| `onPolygonError` | `(error: Error) => void` | Called when instance creation fails |

## Event properties

| Prop                      | Type                                                                                                                                   | Description                           |
| ------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- |
| `onClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when polygon is clicked |
| `onDblClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when double-clicking a polygon |
| `onMouseDown` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse button is down |
| `onMouseMove` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse moves |
| `onMouseOut` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when the pointer goes outside the polygon |
| `onMouseOver` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when the pointer enters the polygon |
| `onMouseUp` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse button up |
| `onRightClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when right-clicking |
| `onTouchStart` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called on touch start |
| `onTouchMove` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called on touch movement |
| `onTouchEnd` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when touch ends |
| `onClickableChanged` | `(clickable: boolean) => void` | Called when clickability changes |
| `onFillColorChanged` | `(fillColor: string) => void` | Called when fill color changes |
| `onFillOpacityChanged` | `(fillOpacity: number) => void` | Called when fill opacity changes |
| `onMapChanged` | `(map: naver.maps.Map \| null) => void` | Called when the bound map changes |
| `onPathChanged` | `(path: naver.maps.ArrayOfCoords \| naver.maps.KVOArrayOfCoords \| naver.maps.ArrayOfCoordsLiteral) => void` | Called when changing a single path |
| `onPathsChanged` | `(paths: naver.maps.ArrayOfCoords[] \| naver.maps.KVOArray<naver.maps.KVOArrayOfCoords> \| naver.maps.ArrayOfCoordsLiteral[]) => void` | Called when changing multiple paths |
| `onStrokeColorChanged` | `(strokeColor: string) => void` | Called when the outline color changes |
| `onStrokeLineCapChanged` | `(strokeLineCap: naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType) => void` | Called when outline end closure changes |
| `onStrokeLineJoinChanged` | `(strokeLineJoin: naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType) => void` | Called when the finish of the outline connection is changed |
| `onStrokeOpacityChanged` | `(strokeOpacity: number) => void` | Called when outline opacity changes |
| `onStrokeStyleChanged` | `(strokeStyle: naver.maps.StrokeStyleType) => void` | Called when outline style changes |
| `onStrokeWeightChanged` | `(strokeWeight: number) => void` | Called when outline thickness changes |
| `onVisibleChanged` | `(visible: boolean) => void` | Called when exposure is changed |
| `onZIndexChanged` | `(zIndex: number) => void` | Called when stacking order is changed |

## Ref method

| Method           | Signature                                                                                                                      | Description                    |
| ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------ |
| `getInstance` | `() => naver.maps.Polygon \| null` | Returns an internal `Polygon` instance |
| `getAreaSize` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["getAreaSize"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["getAreaSize"]> \| undefined` | Area (square meter) query |
| `getBounds` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["getBounds"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["getBounds"]> \| undefined` | coordinate boundary query |
| `getClickable` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["getClickable"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["getClickable"]> \| undefined` | Clickability check |
