| `getDrawingRect` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["getDrawingRect"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["getDrawingRect"]> \| undefined` | Rendering boundary query |
| `getElement` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["getElement"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["getElement"]> \| undefined` | DOM Element Lookup |
| `getMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["getMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["getMap"]> \| undefined` | Binding map query |
| `getOptions` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["getOptions"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["getOptions"]> \| undefined` | Option inquiry |
| `getPanes` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["getPanes"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["getPanes"]> \| undefined` | panes query |
| `getPath` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["getPath"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["getPath"]> \| undefined` | Single path search |
| `getPaths` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["getPaths"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["getPaths"]> \| undefined` | Multiple paths query |
| `getProjection` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["getProjection"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["getProjection"]> \| undefined` | projection query |
| `getStyles` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["getStyles"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["getStyles"]> \| undefined` | Style Lookup |
| `getVisible` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["getVisible"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["getVisible"]> \| undefined` | Check exposure |
| `getZIndex` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["getZIndex"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["getZIndex"]> \| undefined` | zIndex lookup |
| `setClickable` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["setClickable"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["setClickable"]> \| undefined` | Set clickability |
| `setMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["setMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["setMap"]> \| undefined` | map bind/unbind |
| `setOptions` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["setOptions"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["setOptions"]> \| undefined` | Option batch/partial settings |
| `setPath` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["setPath"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["setPath"]> \| undefined` | Single path setting |
| `setPaths` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["setPaths"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["setPaths"]> \| undefined` | Multiple paths configuration |
| `setStyles` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["setStyles"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["setStyles"]> \| undefined` | Style batch/partial settings |
| `setVisible` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["setVisible"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["setVisible"]> \| undefined` | Exposure settings |
| `setZIndex` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Polygon["setZIndex"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Polygon["setZIndex"]> \| undefined` | zIndex Settings |

## Behavior Rules

- When unmounting a component, call `setMap(null)` after cleaning up event listeners.
- If the `map` prop is not specified, the nearest instance of `NaverMap` or `Panorama` is automatically used.

---

## Source File: api/circle.md

- URL: https://react-naver-maps-kit.pages.dev/api/circle
- Local Path: packages/docs/api/circle.md

# Circle

`Circle` is a shape overlay API that wraps `naver.maps.Circle` in a React component.

## public type

```ts
interface CircleOptionProps {
  map?: naver.maps.Map | null;
  center: naver.maps.Coord | naver.maps.CoordLiteral;
  radius?: number;
  strokeWeight?: number;
  strokeOpacity?: number;
  strokeColor?: string;
  strokeStyle?: naver.maps.StrokeStyleType;
  strokeLineCap?: naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType;
  strokeLineJoin?: naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType;
  fillColor?: string;
  fillOpacity?: number;
  clickable?: boolean;
  visible?: boolean;
  zIndex?: number;
}

interface CircleLifecycleProps {
  onCircleReady?: (circle: naver.maps.Circle) => void;
  onCircleDestroy?: () => void;
  onCircleError?: (error: Error) => void;
}

interface CircleEventProps {
  onClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onDblClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseDown?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseMove?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOut?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOver?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseUp?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onRightClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchStart?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchMove?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchEnd?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onCenterChanged?: (center: naver.maps.Coord) => void;
  onClickableChanged?: (clickable: boolean) => void;
  onFillColorChanged?: (fillColor: string) => void;
  onFillOpacityChanged?: (fillOpacity: number) => void;
  onMapChanged?: (map: naver.maps.Map | null) => void;
  onRadiusChanged?: (radius: number) => void;
  onStrokeColorChanged?: (strokeColor: string) => void;
  onStrokeLineCapChanged?: (strokeLineCap: naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType) => void;
  onStrokeLineJoinChanged?: (strokeLineJoin: naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType) => void;
  onStrokeOpacityChanged?: (strokeOpacity: number) => void;
  onStrokeStyleChanged?: (strokeStyle: naver.maps.StrokeStyleType) => void;
  onStrokeWeightChanged?: (strokeWeight: number) => void;
  onVisibleChanged?: (visible: boolean) => void;
  onZIndexChanged?: (zIndex: number) => void;
}

export type CircleProps = CircleOptionProps & CircleLifecycleProps & CircleEventProps;

export interface CircleRef {
  getInstance: () => naver.maps.Circle | null;
  getAreaSize: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getAreaSize"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getAreaSize"]> | undefined;
  getBounds: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getBounds"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getBounds"]> | undefined;
  getCenter: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getCenter"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getCenter"]> | undefined;
  getClickable: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getClickable"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getClickable"]> | undefined;
  getDrawingRect: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getDrawingRect"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getDrawingRect"]> | undefined;
  getElement: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getElement"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getElement"]> | undefined;
  getMap: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getMap"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getMap"]> | undefined;
  getOptions: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getOptions"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getOptions"]> | undefined;
  getPanes: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getPanes"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getPanes"]> | undefined;
  getProjection: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getProjection"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getProjection"]> | undefined;
  getRadius: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getRadius"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getRadius"]> | undefined;
  getStyles: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getStyles"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getStyles"]> | undefined;
  getVisible: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getVisible"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getVisible"]> | undefined;
  getZIndex: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getZIndex"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getZIndex"]> | undefined;
  setCenter: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["setCenter"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["setCenter"]> | undefined;
  setClickable: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["setClickable"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["setClickable"]> | undefined;
  setMap: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["setMap"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["setMap"]> | undefined;
  setOptions: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["setOptions"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["setOptions"]> | undefined;
  setRadius: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["setRadius"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["setRadius"]> | undefined;
  setStyles: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["setStyles"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["setStyles"]> | undefined;
  setVisible: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["setVisible"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["setVisible"]> | undefined;
  setZIndex: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["setZIndex"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["setZIndex"]> | undefined;
}
```

## Option properties

| Prop             | Type                                          | Default      | Description                                                 |
| ---------------- | --------------------------------------------- | ------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------- |
| `map` | `naver.maps.Map \| null` | - | Map instance to bind the shape to (if not specified, use Provider map) |
| `center` | `naver.maps.Coord \| naver.maps.CoordLiteral` | - (required) | Coordinates of the center of a circle |
| `radius` | `number` | `0` | Radius of circle (meters) |
| `strokeWeight` | `number` | `1` | Shape outline thickness |
| `strokeOpacity` | `number` | `1` | Outline Opacity (`0~1`) |
| `strokeColor` | `string` | `#007EEA` | Outline color (CSS color) |
| `strokeStyle` | `naver.maps.StrokeStyleType` | `solid` | Outline Style |
| `strokeLineCap` | `naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType` | `butt` | Outline end closure style |
| `strokeLineJoin` | `naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType` | `miter` | Outline joint closure style |
| `fillColor` | `string` | `none` | Internal fill color (CSS color) |
| `fillOpacity` | `number` | `1` | Inner Fill Opacity (`0~1`) |
| `clickable` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether to receive click/pointer events |
| `visible` | `boolean` | `true` | Shape exposure |
| `zIndex` | `number` | `0` | Shape stacking order |

## Life cycle properties

| Prop              | Type                                  | Description                |
| ----------------- | ------------------------------------- | -------------------------- |
| `onCircleReady` | `(circle: naver.maps.Circle) => void` | Called when instance creation is complete |
| `onCircleDestroy` | `() => void` | Called when instance cleanup is complete |
| `onCircleError` | `(error: Error) => void` | Called when instance creation fails |

## Event properties

| Prop                      | Type                                                      | Description                       |
| ------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------- |
| `onClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Call with one click |
| `onDblClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when double-clicking |
| `onMouseDown` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse button is down |
| `onMouseMove` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse moves |
| `onMouseOut` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when the pointer leaves the circle |
| `onMouseOver` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when the pointer enters the circle |
| `onMouseUp` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse button up |
| `onRightClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when right-clicking |
| `onTouchStart` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called on touch start |
| `onTouchMove` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called on touch movement |
| `onTouchEnd` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when touch ends |
| `onCenterChanged` | `(center: naver.maps.Coord) => void` | Called when center coordinates change |
| `onClickableChanged` | `(clickable: boolean) => void` | Called when clickability changes |
| `onFillColorChanged` | `(fillColor: string) => void` | Called when fill color changes |
| `onFillOpacityChanged` | `(fillOpacity: number) => void` | Called when fill opacity changes |
| `onMapChanged` | `(map: naver.maps.Map \| null) => void` | Called when the bound map changes |
| `onRadiusChanged` | `(radius: number) => void` | Called when radius changes |
| `onStrokeColorChanged` | `(strokeColor: string) => void` | Called when the outline color changes |
| `onStrokeLineCapChanged` | `(strokeLineCap: naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType) => void` | Called when outline end closure changes |
| `onStrokeLineJoinChanged` | `(strokeLineJoin: naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType) => void` | Called when the finish of the outline connection is changed |
| `onStrokeOpacityChanged` | `(strokeOpacity: number) => void` | Called when outline opacity changes |
| `onStrokeStyleChanged` | `(strokeStyle: naver.maps.StrokeStyleType) => void` | Called when outline style changes |
| `onStrokeWeightChanged` | `(strokeWeight: number) => void` | Called when outline thickness changes |
| `onVisibleChanged` | `(visible: boolean) => void` | Called when exposure is changed |
| `onZIndexChanged` | `(zIndex: number) => void` | Called when stacking order is changed |

## Ref method

| Method           | Signature                                                                                                                    | Description                   |
| ---------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------- |
| `getInstance` | `() => naver.maps.Circle \| null` | Returns an internal `Circle` instance |
| `getAreaSize` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getAreaSize"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getAreaSize"]> \| undefined` | Area (square meter) query |
| `getBounds` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getBounds"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getBounds"]> \| undefined` | coordinate boundary query |
| `getCenter` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getCenter"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getCenter"]> \| undefined` | Center coordinate query |
| `getClickable` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getClickable"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getClickable"]> \| undefined` | Clickability check |
| `getDrawingRect` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getDrawingRect"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getDrawingRect"]> \| undefined` | Rendering boundary query |
| `getElement` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getElement"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getElement"]> \| undefined` | DOM Element Lookup |
| `getMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getMap"]> \| undefined` | Binding map query |
| `getOptions` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getOptions"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getOptions"]> \| undefined` | Option inquiry |
| `getPanes` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getPanes"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getPanes"]> \| undefined` | panes query |
| `getProjection` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getProjection"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getProjection"]> \| undefined` | projection query |
| `getRadius` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getRadius"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getRadius"]> \| undefined` | radius lookup |
| `getStyles` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getStyles"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getStyles"]> \| undefined` | Style Lookup |
| `getVisible` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getVisible"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getVisible"]> \| undefined` | Check exposure |
| `getZIndex` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["getZIndex"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["getZIndex"]> \| undefined` | zIndex lookup |
| `setCenter` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["setCenter"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["setCenter"]> \| undefined` | Setting center coordinates |
| `setClickable` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["setClickable"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["setClickable"]> \| undefined` | Set clickability |
| `setMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["setMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["setMap"]> \| undefined` | map bind/unbind |
| `setOptions` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["setOptions"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["setOptions"]> \| undefined` | Option batch/partial settings |
| `setRadius` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["setRadius"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["setRadius"]> \| undefined` | Set radius |
| `setStyles` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["setStyles"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["setStyles"]> \| undefined` | Style batch/partial settings |
| `setVisible` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["setVisible"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["setVisible"]> \| undefined` | Exposure settings |
| `setZIndex` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Circle["setZIndex"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Circle["setZIndex"]> \| undefined` | zIndex Settings |

## Behavior Rules

- When unmounting a component, call `setMap(null)` after cleaning up event listeners.
- If the `map` prop is not specified, the nearest instance of `NaverMap` or `Panorama` is automatically used.

---

## Source File: api/ellipse.md

- URL: https://react-naver-maps-kit.pages.dev/api/ellipse
- Local Path: packages/docs/api/ellipse.md

# Ellipse

`Ellipse` is an overlay API that wraps `naver.maps.Ellipse` in a React component.

## public type

```ts
interface EllipseOptionProps {
  map?: naver.maps.Map | null;
  bounds: naver.maps.Bounds | naver.maps.BoundsLiteral;
  strokeWeight?: number;
  strokeOpacity?: number;
  strokeColor?: string;
  strokeStyle?: naver.maps.StrokeStyleType;
  strokeLineCap?: naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType;
  strokeLineJoin?: naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType;
  fillColor?: string;
  fillOpacity?: number;
  clickable?: boolean;
  visible?: boolean;
  zIndex?: number;
}

interface EllipseLifecycleProps {
  onEllipseReady?: (ellipse: naver.maps.Ellipse) => void;
  onEllipseDestroy?: () => void;
  onEllipseError?: (error: Error) => void;
}

interface EllipseEventProps {
  onClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onDblClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseDown?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseMove?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOut?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOver?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseUp?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onRightClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchStart?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchMove?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchEnd?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onBoundsChanged?: (bounds: naver.maps.Bounds) => void;
  onClickableChanged?: (clickable: boolean) => void;
  onFillColorChanged?: (fillColor: string) => void;
  onFillOpacityChanged?: (fillOpacity: number) => void;
  onMapChanged?: (map: naver.maps.Map | null) => void;
  onStrokeColorChanged?: (strokeColor: string) => void;
  onStrokeLineCapChanged?: (strokeLineCap: naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType) => void;
  onStrokeLineJoinChanged?: (strokeLineJoin: naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType) => void;
  onStrokeOpacityChanged?: (strokeOpacity: number) => void;
  onStrokeStyleChanged?: (strokeStyle: naver.maps.StrokeStyleType) => void;
  onStrokeWeightChanged?: (strokeWeight: number) => void;
  onVisibleChanged?: (visible: boolean) => void;
  onZIndexChanged?: (zIndex: number) => void;
}

export type EllipseProps = EllipseOptionProps & EllipseLifecycleProps & EllipseEventProps;
```

## Option properties

| Prop             | Type                                            | Default      | Description                                                 |
| ---------------- | ----------------------------------------------- | ------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------- |
| `map` | `naver.maps.Map \| null` | - | Map instance to bind the ellipse to (if not specified, use Provider map) |
| `bounds` | `naver.maps.Bounds \| naver.maps.BoundsLiteral` | - (required) | circumscribed boundaries of an ellipse |
| `strokeWeight` | `number` | - | Outline Thickness |
| `strokeOpacity` | `number` | - | Outline opacity (`0~1`) |
| `strokeColor` | `string` | - | Outline color (CSS color) |
| `strokeStyle` | `naver.maps.StrokeStyleType` | - | Outline Style |
| `strokeLineCap` | `naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType` | - | Outline End Closure Style |
| `strokeLineJoin` | `naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType` | - | Outline joint closure style |
| `fillColor` | `string` | - | Internal fill color (CSS color) |
| `fillOpacity` | `number` | - | Inner Fill Opacity (`0~1`) |
| `clickable` | `boolean` | - | Whether to receive click/pointer events |
| `visible` | `boolean` | - | Exposure |
| `zIndex` | `number` | - | Stacking order |

## Life cycle properties

| Prop               | Type                                    | Description                |
| ------------------ | --------------------------------------- | -------------------------- |
| `onEllipseReady` | `(ellipse: naver.maps.Ellipse) => void` | Called when instance creation is complete |
| `onEllipseDestroy` | `() => void` | Called when instance cleanup is complete |
| `onEllipseError` | `(error: Error) => void` | Called when instance creation fails |

## Event properties

| Prop                      | Type                                                      | Description                         |
| ------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------- |
| `onClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when ellipse is clicked |
| `onDblClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when double-clicking the ellipse |
| `onMouseDown` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse button is down |
| `onMouseMove` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse moves |
| `onMouseOut` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when the pointer goes outside the oval |
| `onMouseOver` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when the pointer enters the oval |
| `onMouseUp` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse button up |
| `onRightClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when right-clicking |
| `onTouchStart` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called on touch start |
| `onTouchMove` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called on touch movement |
| `onTouchEnd` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when touch ends |
| `onBoundsChanged` | `(bounds: naver.maps.Bounds) => void` | Called when ellipse bounds change |
| `onClickableChanged` | `(clickable: boolean) => void` | Called when clickability changes |
| `onFillColorChanged` | `(fillColor: string) => void` | Called when fill color changes |
| `onFillOpacityChanged` | `(fillOpacity: number) => void` | Called when fill opacity changes |
| `onMapChanged` | `(map: naver.maps.Map \| null) => void` | Called when the bound map changes |
| `onStrokeColorChanged` | `(strokeColor: string) => void` | Called when the outline color changes |
| `onStrokeLineCapChanged` | `(strokeLineCap: naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType) => void` | Called when outline end closure changes |
| `onStrokeLineJoinChanged` | `(strokeLineJoin: naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType) => void` | Called when the finish of the outline connection is changed |
| `onStrokeOpacityChanged` | `(strokeOpacity: number) => void` | Called when outline opacity changes |
| `onStrokeStyleChanged` | `(strokeStyle: naver.maps.StrokeStyleType) => void` | Called when outline style changes |
| `onStrokeWeightChanged` | `(strokeWeight: number) => void` | Called when outline thickness changes |
| `onVisibleChanged` | `(visible: boolean) => void` | Called when exposure is changed |
| `onZIndexChanged` | `(zIndex: number) => void` | Called when stacking order is changed |

## Ref method

| Method           | Signature                                                                                                                      | Description                    |
| ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------ |
| `getInstance` | `() => naver.maps.Ellipse \| null` | Returns an internal `Ellipse` instance |
| `getAreaSize` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["getAreaSize"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["getAreaSize"]> \| undefined` | Area (square meter) query |
| `getBounds` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["getBounds"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["getBounds"]> \| undefined` | coordinate boundary query |
| `getClickable` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["getClickable"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["getClickable"]> \| undefined` | Clickability check |
| `getDrawingRect` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["getDrawingRect"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["getDrawingRect"]> \| undefined` | Rendering boundary query |
| `getElement` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["getElement"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["getElement"]> \| undefined` | DOM Element Lookup |
| `getMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["getMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["getMap"]> \| undefined` | Binding map query |
| `getOptions` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["getOptions"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["getOptions"]> \| undefined` | Option inquiry |
| `getPanes` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["getPanes"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["getPanes"]> \| undefined` | panes query |
| `getProjection` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["getProjection"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["getProjection"]> \| undefined` | projection query |
| `getStyles` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["getStyles"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["getStyles"]> \| undefined` | Style Lookup |
| `getVisible` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["getVisible"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["getVisible"]> \| undefined` | Check exposure |
| `getZIndex` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["getZIndex"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["getZIndex"]> \| undefined` | zIndex lookup |
| `setBounds` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["setBounds"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["setBounds"]> \| undefined` | Setting bounds |
| `setClickable` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["setClickable"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["setClickable"]> \| undefined` | Set clickability |
| `setMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["setMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["setMap"]> \| undefined` | map bind/unbind |
| `setOptions` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["setOptions"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["setOptions"]> \| undefined` | Option batch/partial settings |
| `setStyles` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["setStyles"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["setStyles"]> \| undefined` | Style batch/partial settings |
| `setVisible` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["setVisible"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["setVisible"]> \| undefined` | Exposure settings |
| `setZIndex` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Ellipse["setZIndex"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Ellipse["setZIndex"]> \| undefined` | zIndex Settings |

## Behavior Rules

- When unmounting a component, call `setMap(null)` after cleaning up event listeners.
- If the `map` prop is not specified, the nearest instance of `NaverMap` or `Panorama` is automatically used.

## Source File: api/rectangle.md

- URL: https://react-naver-maps-kit.pages.dev/api/rectangle
- Local Path: packages/docs/api/rectangle.md

# Rectangle

`Rectangle` is an overlay API that wraps `naver.maps.Rectangle` in a React component.

## public type

```ts
interface RectangleOptionProps {
  map?: naver.maps.Map | null;
  bounds: naver.maps.Bounds | naver.maps.BoundsLiteral;
  strokeWeight?: number;
  strokeOpacity?: number;
  strokeColor?: string;
  strokeStyle?: naver.maps.StrokeStyleType;
  strokeLineCap?: naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType;
  strokeLineJoin?: naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType;
  fillColor?: string;
  fillOpacity?: number;
  clickable?: boolean;
  visible?: boolean;
  zIndex?: number;
}

interface RectangleLifecycleProps {
  onRectangleReady?: (rectangle: naver.maps.Rectangle) => void;
  onRectangleDestroy?: () => void;
  onRectangleError?: (error: Error) => void;
}

interface RectangleEventProps {
  onClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onDblClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseDown?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseMove?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOut?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOver?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseUp?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onRightClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchStart?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchMove?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchEnd?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onBoundsChanged?: (bounds: naver.maps.Bounds) => void;
  onClickableChanged?: (clickable: boolean) => void;
  onFillColorChanged?: (fillColor: string) => void;
  onFillOpacityChanged?: (fillOpacity: number) => void;
  onMapChanged?: (map: naver.maps.Map | null) => void;
  onStrokeColorChanged?: (strokeColor: string) => void;
  onStrokeLineCapChanged?: (strokeLineCap: naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType) => void;
  onStrokeLineJoinChanged?: (strokeLineJoin: naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType) => void;
  onStrokeOpacityChanged?: (strokeOpacity: number) => void;
  onStrokeStyleChanged?: (strokeStyle: naver.maps.StrokeStyleType) => void;
  onStrokeWeightChanged?: (strokeWeight: number) => void;
  onVisibleChanged?: (visible: boolean) => void;
  onZIndexChanged?: (zIndex: number) => void;
}

export type RectangleProps = RectangleOptionProps & RectangleLifecycleProps & RectangleEventProps;
```

## Option properties

| Prop             | Type                                            | Default      | Description                                                   |
| ---------------- | ----------------------------------------------- | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `map` | `naver.maps.Map \| null` | - | Map instance to bind the rectangle to (if not specified, use Provider map) |
| `bounds` | `naver.maps.Bounds \| naver.maps.BoundsLiteral` | - (required) | rectangle bounds |
| `strokeWeight` | `number` | - | Outline Thickness |
| `strokeOpacity` | `number` | - | Outline Opacity (`0~1`) |
| `strokeColor` | `string` | - | Outline color (CSS color) |
| `strokeStyle` | `naver.maps.StrokeStyleType` | - | Outline Style |
| `strokeLineCap` | `naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType` | - | Outline end closure style |
| `strokeLineJoin` | `naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType` | - | Outline joint closure style |
| `fillColor` | `string` | - | Internal fill color (CSS color) |
| `fillOpacity` | `number` | - | Inner Fill Opacity (`0~1`) |
| `clickable` | `boolean` | - | Whether to receive click/pointer events |
| `visible` | `boolean` | - | Exposure |
| `zIndex` | `number` | - | Stacking order |

## Life cycle properties

| Prop                 | Type                                        | Description                |
| -------------------- | ------------------------------------------- | -------------------------- |
| `onRectangleReady` | `(rectangle: naver.maps.Rectangle) => void` | Called when instance creation is complete |
| `onRectangleDestroy` | `() => void` | Called when instance cleanup is complete |
| `onRectangleError` | `(error: Error) => void` | Called when instance creation fails |

## Event properties

| Prop                      | Type                                                      | Description                           |
| ------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- |
| `onClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when a square is clicked |
| `onDblClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when a square is double-clicked |
| `onMouseDown` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse button is down |
| `onMouseMove` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse moves |
| `onMouseOut` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when the pointer leaves the rectangle |
| `onMouseOver` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when the pointer enters the rectangle |
| `onMouseUp` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse button up |
| `onRightClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when right-clicking |
| `onTouchStart` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called on touch start |
| `onTouchMove` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called on touch movement |
| `onTouchEnd` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when touch ends |
| `onBoundsChanged` | `(bounds: naver.maps.Bounds) => void` | Called when bounds change |
| `onClickableChanged` | `(clickable: boolean) => void` | Called when clickability changes |
| `onFillColorChanged` | `(fillColor: string) => void` | Called when fill color changes |
| `onFillOpacityChanged` | `(fillOpacity: number) => void` | Called when fill opacity changes |
| `onMapChanged` | `(map: naver.maps.Map \| null) => void` | Called when the bound map changes |
| `onStrokeColorChanged` | `(strokeColor: string) => void` | Called when the outline color changes |
| `onStrokeLineCapChanged` | `(strokeLineCap: naver.maps.StrokeLineCapType) => void` | Called when outline end closure changes |
| `onStrokeLineJoinChanged` | `(strokeLineJoin: naver.maps.StrokeLineJoinType) => void` | Called when the finish of the outline connection is changed |
| `onStrokeOpacityChanged` | `(strokeOpacity: number) => void` | Called when outline opacity changes |
| `onStrokeStyleChanged` | `(strokeStyle: naver.maps.StrokeStyleType) => void` | Called when outline style changes |
| `onStrokeWeightChanged` | `(strokeWeight: number) => void` | Called when outline thickness changes |
| `onVisibleChanged` | `(visible: boolean) => void` | Called when exposure is changed |
| `onZIndexChanged` | `(zIndex: number) => void` | Called when stacking order is changed |

## Ref method

| Method           | Signature                                                                                                                          | Description                      |
| ---------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- |
| `getInstance` | `() => naver.maps.Rectangle \| null` | Returns an internal `Rectangle` instance |
| `getAreaSize` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["getAreaSize"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["getAreaSize"]> \| undefined` | Area (square meter) query |
| `getBounds` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["getBounds"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["getBounds"]> \| undefined` | coordinate boundary query |
| `getClickable` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["getClickable"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["getClickable"]> \| undefined` | Clickability check |
| `getDrawingRect` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["getDrawingRect"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["getDrawingRect"]> \| undefined` | Rendering boundary query |
| `getElement` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["getElement"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["getElement"]> \| undefined` | DOM Element Lookup |
| `getMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["getMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["getMap"]> \| undefined` | Binding map query |
| `getOptions` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["getOptions"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["getOptions"]> \| undefined` | Option inquiry |
| `getPanes` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["getPanes"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["getPanes"]> \| undefined` | panes query |
| `getProjection` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["getProjection"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["getProjection"]> \| undefined` | projection query |
| `getStyles` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["getStyles"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["getStyles"]> \| undefined` | Style Lookup |
| `getVisible` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["getVisible"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["getVisible"]> \| undefined` | Check exposure |
| `getZIndex` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["getZIndex"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["getZIndex"]> \| undefined` | zIndex lookup |
| `setBounds` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["setBounds"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["setBounds"]> \| undefined` | Setting bounds |
| `setClickable` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["setClickable"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["setClickable"]> \| undefined` | Set clickability |
| `setMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["setMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["setMap"]> \| undefined` | map bind/unbind |
| `setOptions` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["setOptions"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["setOptions"]> \| undefined` | Option batch/partial settings |
| `setStyles` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["setStyles"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["setStyles"]> \| undefined` | Style batch/partial settings |
| `setVisible` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["setVisible"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["setVisible"]> \| undefined` | Exposure settings |
| `setZIndex` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Rectangle["setZIndex"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Rectangle["setZIndex"]> \| undefined` | zIndex Settings |

## Behavior Rules

- When unmounting a component, call `setMap(null)` after cleaning up event listeners.
- If the `map` prop is not specified, the nearest instance of `NaverMap` or `Panorama` is automatically used.

---

## Source File: api/ground-overlay.md

- URL: https://react-naver-maps-kit.pages.dev/api/ground-overlay
- Local Path: packages/docs/api/ground-overlay.md

# GroundOverlay

`GroundOverlay` is an overlay API that wraps `naver.maps.GroundOverlay` in a React component.

## public type

```ts
interface GroundOverlayOptionProps {
  map?: naver.maps.Map | null;
  url: string;
  bounds: naver.maps.Bounds | naver.maps.BoundsLiteral;
  clickable?: boolean;
  opacity?: number;
}

interface GroundOverlayLifecycleProps {
  onGroundOverlayReady?: (groundOverlay: naver.maps.GroundOverlay) => void;
  onGroundOverlayDestroy?: () => void;
  onGroundOverlayError?: (error: Error) => void;
}

interface GroundOverlayEventProps {
  onClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onDblClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseDown?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseMove?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOut?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOver?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseUp?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onRightClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchStart?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchMove?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onTouchEnd?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onBoundsChanged?: (bounds: naver.maps.Bounds) => void;
  onClickableChanged?: (clickable: boolean) => void;
  onMapChanged?: (map: naver.maps.Map | null) => void;
  onOpacityChanged?: (opacity: number) => void;
}

export type GroundOverlayProps = GroundOverlayOptionProps &
  GroundOverlayLifecycleProps &
  GroundOverlayEventProps;
```

## Option properties

| Prop        | Type                                            | Default      | Description                                                     |
| ----------- | ----------------------------------------------- | ------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `map` | `naver.maps.Map \| null` | - | Map instance to bind the overlay to (if not specified, use Provider map) |
| `url` | `string` | - (required) | Ground overlay image URL to display |
| `bounds` | `naver.maps.Bounds \| naver.maps.BoundsLiteral` | - (required) | Geographical boundaries that the image will cover |
| `clickable` | `boolean` | - | Whether to receive click/pointer events |
| `opacity` | `number` | - | Overlay Transparency |

## Life cycle properties

| Prop                     | Type                                                | Description                |
| ------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------- |
| `onGroundOverlayReady` | `(groundOverlay: naver.maps.GroundOverlay) => void` | Called when instance creation is complete |
| `onGroundOverlayDestroy` | `() => void` | Called when instance cleanup is complete |
| `onGroundOverlayError` | `(error: Error) => void` | Called when instance creation fails |

## Event properties

| Prop                 | Type                                       | Description                             |
| -------------------- | ------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------- |
| `onClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when overlay is clicked |
| `onDblClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when double-clicking the overlay |
| `onMouseDown` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse button is down |
| `onMouseMove` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse moves |
| `onMouseOut` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when the pointer leaves the overlay |
| `onMouseOver` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when the pointer enters the overlay |
| `onMouseUp` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse button up |
| `onRightClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when right-clicking |
| `onTouchStart` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called on touch start |
| `onTouchMove` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called on touch movement |
| `onTouchEnd` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when touch ends |
| `onBoundsChanged` | `(bounds: naver.maps.Bounds) => void` | Called when overlay bounds change |
| `onClickableChanged` | `(clickable: boolean) => void` | Called when clickability changes |
| `onMapChanged` | `(map: naver.maps.Map \| null) => void` | Called when the bound map changes |
| `onOpacityChanged` | `(opacity: number) => void` | Called when opacity changes |

## Ref method

| Method          | Signature                                                                                                                                | Description                          |
| --------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------ |
| `getInstance` | `() => naver.maps.GroundOverlay \| null` | Returns an internal `GroundOverlay` instance |
| `getBounds` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.GroundOverlay["getBounds"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.GroundOverlay["getBounds"]> \| undefined` | bounds query |
| `getMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.GroundOverlay["getMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.GroundOverlay["getMap"]> \| undefined` | Binding map query |
| `getOpacity` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.GroundOverlay["getOpacity"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.GroundOverlay["getOpacity"]> \| undefined` | opacity query |
| `getPanes` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.GroundOverlay["getPanes"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.GroundOverlay["getPanes"]> \| undefined` | panes query |
| `getProjection` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.GroundOverlay["getProjection"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.GroundOverlay["getProjection"]> \| undefined` | projection query |
| `getUrl` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.GroundOverlay["getUrl"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.GroundOverlay["getUrl"]> \| undefined` | Image URL lookup |
| `setMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.GroundOverlay["setMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.GroundOverlay["setMap"]> \| undefined` | map bind/unbind |
| `setOpacity` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.GroundOverlay["setOpacity"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.GroundOverlay["setOpacity"]> \| undefined` | opacity settings |
| `setUrl` | `(url: string) => void \| undefined` | Image URL settings |

## Behavior Rules

- When unmounting a component, call `setMap(null)` after cleaning up event listeners.
- If the `map` prop is not specified, the nearest instance of `NaverMap` or `Panorama` is automatically used.

---

## Source File: api/geo-json.md

- URL: https://react-naver-maps-kit.pages.dev/api/geo-json
- Local Path: packages/docs/api/geo-json.md

# GeoJson

`GeoJson` is a component that declaratively renders GeoJSON data onto a map.
`naver.maps.Data` is created internally, and when the `data` prop changes, the old Feature is automatically removed and a new Feature is added.

## public type

```ts
interface GeoJsonOptionProps {
  data: naver.maps.GeoJSON;
  autoStyle?: boolean;
  style?: naver.maps.StyleOptions | naver.maps.StylingFunction;
}

interface GeoJsonLifecycleProps {
  onDataReady?: (data: naver.maps.Data) => void;
  onDataDestroy?: () => void;
  onDataError?: (error: Error) => void;
  onFeaturesAdded?: (features: naver.maps.Feature[]) => void;
}

interface GeoJsonEventProps {
  onAddFeature?: (event: naver.maps.FeatureEvent) => void;
  onRemoveFeature?: (event: naver.maps.FeatureEvent) => void;
  onPropertyChanged?: (event: naver.maps.PropertyEvent) => void;
  onClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onDblClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onRightClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseDown?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseUp?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOver?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOut?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
}

export type GeoJsonProps = GeoJsonOptionProps & GeoJsonLifecycleProps & GeoJsonEventProps;

export interface GeoJsonRef {
  getInstance: () => naver.maps.Data | null;
  getAllFeature: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getAllFeature"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getAllFeature"]> | undefined;
  getFeatureById: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getFeatureById"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getFeatureById"]> | undefined;
  getMap: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getMap"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getMap"]> | undefined;
  getStyle: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getStyle"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getStyle"]> | undefined;
  overrideStyle: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["overrideStyle"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["overrideStyle"]> | undefined;
  removeFeature: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["removeFeature"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["removeFeature"]> | undefined;
  revertStyle: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["revertStyle"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["revertStyle"]> | undefined;
  setStyle: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["setStyle"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["setStyle"]> | undefined;
  toGeoJson: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["toGeoJson"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["toGeoJson"]> | undefined;
}
```

## Option properties

| Prop        | Type                                                    | Default  | Description                                              |
| ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| `data` | `naver.maps.GeoJSON` | - (required) | GeoJSON data to render (Feature or FeatureCollection) |
| `autoStyle` | `boolean` | `true` | Whether to apply automatic styling |
| `style` | `naver.maps.StyleOptions \| naver.maps.StylingFunction` | - | Data layer's default style or Feature-specific styling function |

### GeoJSON data format

The `data` prop takes a GeoJSON `Feature` or `FeatureCollection` object:

```ts
// Feature
{
  type: "Feature",
properties: { name: "Seoul City Hall" },
  geometry: {
    type: "Point",
    coordinates: [126.978, 37.566]
  }
}

// FeatureCollection
{
  type: "FeatureCollection",
  features: [
    { type: "Feature", properties: {}, geometry: { type: "Polygon", coordinates: [...] } },
    { type: "Feature", properties: {}, geometry: { type: "Point", coordinates: [...] } }
  ]
}
```

Supported geometry types: `Point`, `MultiPoint`, `LineString`, `MultiLineString`, `Polygon`, `MultiPolygon`

## Life cycle properties

| Prop              | Type                                       | Description                                 |
| ----------------- | ------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------- |
| `onDataReady` | `(data: naver.maps.Data) => void` | Called when internal Data instance creation is complete |
| `onDataDestroy` | `() => void` | Called when instance cleanup is complete |
| `onDataError` | `(error: Error) => void` | Called when instance creation or data addition fails |
| `onFeaturesAdded` | `(features: naver.maps.Feature[]) => void` | Called when feature addition is complete in GeoJSON |

## Event properties

| Prop                | Type                                        | Description                            |
| ------------------- | ------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| `onAddFeature` | `(event: naver.maps.FeatureEvent) => void` | Called when adding a feature |
| `onRemoveFeature` | `(event: naver.maps.FeatureEvent) => void` | Called when feature is removed |
| `onPropertyChanged` | `(event: naver.maps.PropertyEvent) => void` | Called when feature property changes |
| `onClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when feature is clicked |
| `onDblClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Feature Called when double-clicking |
| `onRightClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when right-clicking |
| `onMouseDown` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse button is down |
| `onMouseUp` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse button up |
| `onMouseOver` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when the pointer enters the Feature |
| `onMouseOut` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when the pointer goes out of the Feature |

## Ref method

| Method           | Signature                                                                                                                | Description                        |
| ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------- |
| `getInstance` | `() => naver.maps.Data \| null` | Returns an internal `Data` instance |
| `getAllFeature` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getAllFeature"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getAllFeature"]> \| undefined` | View all Features |
| `getFeatureById` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getFeatureById"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getFeatureById"]> \| undefined` | Feature search by ID |
| `getMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getMap"]> \| undefined` | Binding map query |
| `getStyle` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getStyle"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getStyle"]> \| undefined` | View current style |
| `overrideStyle` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["overrideStyle"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["overrideStyle"]> \| undefined` | Override a specific Feature style |
| `removeFeature` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["removeFeature"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["removeFeature"]> \| undefined` | Remove Feature |
| `revertStyle` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["revertStyle"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["revertStyle"]> \| undefined` | Revert Style |
| `setStyle` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["setStyle"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["setStyle"]> \| undefined` | Style Settings |
| `toGeoJson` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["toGeoJson"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["toGeoJson"]> \| undefined` | Export entire data as GeoJSON |

## Behavior Rules

- When the `data` prop changes, it automatically removes the old GeoJSON Feature and adds new data.
- When unmounting a component, call `setMap(null)` after cleaning up event listeners.
- If the `map` prop is not specified, the nearest instance of `NaverMap` or `Panorama` is automatically used.
- If the references to the `data` prop are the same, the update is skipped. To update data, pass a new object.
- If imperative control is needed, you can directly access the internal `naver.maps.Data` instance with `getInstance()` through ref.

---

## Source File: api/gpx.md

- URL: https://react-naver-maps-kit.pages.dev/api/gpx
- Local Path: packages/docs/api/gpx.md

# Gpx

`Gpx` is a component that loads a GPX (GPS Exchange Format) file as a URL and renders it on a map.
Create `naver.maps.Data` internally, fetch GPX XML from URL, and add Feature with `addGpx`.
When the `url` prop changes, the existing Feature is removed and new data is loaded.

## public type

```ts
interface GpxOptionProps {
  url: string;
  autoStyle?: boolean;
  style?: naver.maps.StyleOptions | naver.maps.StylingFunction;
}

interface GpxLifecycleProps {
  onDataReady?: (data: naver.maps.Data) => void;
  onDataDestroy?: () => void;
  onDataError?: (error: Error) => void;
  onFeaturesAdded?: (features: naver.maps.Feature[]) => void;
}

interface GpxEventProps {
  onAddFeature?: (event: naver.maps.FeatureEvent) => void;
  onRemoveFeature?: (event: naver.maps.FeatureEvent) => void;
  onPropertyChanged?: (event: naver.maps.PropertyEvent) => void;
  onClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onDblClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onRightClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseDown?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseUp?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOver?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOut?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
}

export type GpxProps = GpxOptionProps & GpxLifecycleProps & GpxEventProps;

export interface GpxRef {
  getInstance: () => naver.maps.Data | null;
  getAllFeature: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getAllFeature"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getAllFeature"]> | undefined;
  getFeatureById: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getFeatureById"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getFeatureById"]> | undefined;
  getMap: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getMap"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getMap"]> | undefined;
  getStyle: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getStyle"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getStyle"]> | undefined;
  overrideStyle: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["overrideStyle"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["overrideStyle"]> | undefined;
  removeFeature: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["removeFeature"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["removeFeature"]> | undefined;
  revertStyle: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["revertStyle"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["revertStyle"]> | undefined;
  setStyle: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["setStyle"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["setStyle"]> | undefined;
  toGeoJson: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["toGeoJson"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["toGeoJson"]> | undefined;
}
```

## Option properties

| Prop        | Type                                                    | Default  | Description                                              |
| ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| `url` | `string` | - (required) | URL of GPX file |
| `autoStyle` | `boolean` | `true` | Whether to apply automatic styling |
| `style` | `naver.maps.StyleOptions \| naver.maps.StylingFunction` | - | Data layer's default style or Feature-specific styling function |

## Life cycle properties

| Prop              | Type                                       | Description                           |
| ----------------- | ------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------- |
| `onDataReady` | `(data: naver.maps.Data) => void` | Called when internal Data instance creation is complete |
| `onDataDestroy` | `() => void` | Called when instance cleanup is complete |
| `onDataError` | `(error: Error) => void` | Called when fetch fails or XML parsing fails |
| `onFeaturesAdded` | `(features: naver.maps.Feature[]) => void` | Called when feature addition is completed in GPX |

## Event properties

| Prop                | Type                                        | Description                            |
| ------------------- | ------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| `onAddFeature` | `(event: naver.maps.FeatureEvent) => void` | Called when adding a feature |
| `onRemoveFeature` | `(event: naver.maps.FeatureEvent) => void` | Called when feature is removed |
| `onPropertyChanged` | `(event: naver.maps.PropertyEvent) => void` | Called when feature property changes |
| `onClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when feature is clicked |
| `onDblClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Feature Called when double-clicking |
| `onRightClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when right-clicking |
| `onMouseDown` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse button is down |
| `onMouseUp` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse button up |
| `onMouseOver` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when the pointer enters the Feature |
| `onMouseOut` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when the pointer goes out of the Feature |

## Ref method

| Method           | Signature                                                                                                                | Description                        |
| ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------- |
| `getInstance` | `() => naver.maps.Data \| null` | Returns an internal `Data` instance |
| `getAllFeature` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getAllFeature"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getAllFeature"]> \| undefined` | View all Features |
| `getFeatureById` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getFeatureById"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getFeatureById"]> \| undefined` | Feature search by ID |
| `getMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getMap"]> \| undefined` | Binding map query |
| `getStyle` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getStyle"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getStyle"]> \| undefined` | View current style |
| `overrideStyle` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["overrideStyle"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["overrideStyle"]> \| undefined` | Override a specific Feature style |
| `removeFeature` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["removeFeature"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["removeFeature"]> \| undefined` | Remove Feature |
| `revertStyle` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["revertStyle"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["revertStyle"]> \| undefined` | Revert Style |
| `setStyle` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["setStyle"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["setStyle"]> \| undefined` | Style Settings |
| `toGeoJson` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["toGeoJson"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["toGeoJson"]> \| undefined` | Export entire data as GeoJSON |

## Behavior Rules

- When the `url` prop changes, the existing Feature is removed and a new GPX file is fetched and loaded.
- If a component is unmounted during asynchronous fetch, the request is automatically aborted.
- If GPX XML parsing fails, `onDataError` is called.
- When unmounting a component, call `setMap(null)` after cleaning up event listeners.
- If the `map` prop is not specified, the nearest instance of `NaverMap` or `Panorama` is automatically used.

---

## Source File: api/kmz.md

- URL: https://react-naver-maps-kit.pages.dev/api/kmz
- Local Path: packages/docs/api/kmz.md

# Kmz

`Kmz` is a component that loads a KMZ (Keyhole Markup Language Zipped) file as a URL and renders it on a map.
KMZ is a format in which the KML file is compressed into ZIP. It is automatically decompressed internally and features are added with `naver.maps.Data.addKml`.
When the `url` prop changes, the existing Feature is removed and new data is loaded.

## public type

```ts
interface KmzOptionProps {
  url: string;
  autoStyle?: boolean;
  style?: naver.maps.StyleOptions | naver.maps.StylingFunction;
}

interface KmzLifecycleProps {
  onDataReady?: (data: naver.maps.Data) => void;
  onDataDestroy?: () => void;
  onDataError?: (error: Error) => void;
  onFeaturesAdded?: (features: naver.maps.Feature[]) => void;
}

interface KmzEventProps {
  onAddFeature?: (event: naver.maps.FeatureEvent) => void;
  onRemoveFeature?: (event: naver.maps.FeatureEvent) => void;
  onPropertyChanged?: (event: naver.maps.PropertyEvent) => void;
  onClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onDblClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onRightClick?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseDown?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseUp?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOver?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
  onMouseOut?: (event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void;
}

export type KmzProps = KmzOptionProps & KmzLifecycleProps & KmzEventProps;

export interface KmzRef {
  getInstance: () => naver.maps.Data | null;
  getAllFeature: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getAllFeature"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getAllFeature"]> | undefined;
  getFeatureById: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getFeatureById"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getFeatureById"]> | undefined;
  getMap: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getMap"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getMap"]> | undefined;
  getStyle: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getStyle"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getStyle"]> | undefined;
  overrideStyle: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["overrideStyle"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["overrideStyle"]> | undefined;
  removeFeature: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["removeFeature"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["removeFeature"]> | undefined;
  revertStyle: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["revertStyle"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["revertStyle"]> | undefined;
  setStyle: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["setStyle"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["setStyle"]> | undefined;
  toGeoJson: (
    ...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["toGeoJson"]>
  ) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["toGeoJson"]> | undefined;
}
```

## Option properties

| Prop        | Type                                                    | Default  | Description                                              |
| ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| `url` | `string` | - (required) | URL of KMZ file |
| `autoStyle` | `boolean` | `true` | Whether to apply automatic styling |
| `style` | `naver.maps.StyleOptions \| naver.maps.StylingFunction` | - | Data layer's default style or Feature-specific styling function |

## Life cycle properties

| Prop              | Type                                       | Description                                 |
| ----------------- | ------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------- |
| `onDataReady` | `(data: naver.maps.Data) => void` | Called when internal Data instance creation is complete |
| `onDataDestroy` | `() => void` | Called when instance cleanup is complete |
| `onDataError` | `(error: Error) => void` | fetch, called when decompressing or KML parsing fails |
| `onFeaturesAdded` | `(features: naver.maps.Feature[]) => void` | Called when feature addition is complete in KML |

## Event properties

| Prop                | Type                                        | Description                            |
| ------------------- | ------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| `onAddFeature` | `(event: naver.maps.FeatureEvent) => void` | Called when adding a feature |
| `onRemoveFeature` | `(event: naver.maps.FeatureEvent) => void` | Called when feature is removed |
| `onPropertyChanged` | `(event: naver.maps.PropertyEvent) => void` | Called when feature property changes |
| `onClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when feature is clicked |
| `onDblClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Feature Called when double-clicking |
| `onRightClick` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when right-clicking |
| `onMouseDown` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse button is down |
| `onMouseUp` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when mouse button up |
| `onMouseOver` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when the pointer enters the Feature |
| `onMouseOut` | `(event: naver.maps.PointerEvent) => void` | Called when the pointer goes out of the Feature |

## Ref method

| Method           | Signature                                                                                                                | Description                        |
| ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------- |
| `getInstance` | `() => naver.maps.Data \| null` | Returns an internal `Data` instance |
| `getAllFeature` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getAllFeature"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getAllFeature"]> \| undefined` | View all Features |
| `getFeatureById` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getFeatureById"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getFeatureById"]> \| undefined` | Feature search by ID |
| `getMap` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getMap"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getMap"]> \| undefined` | Binding map query |
| `getStyle` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["getStyle"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["getStyle"]> \| undefined` | View current style |
| `overrideStyle` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["overrideStyle"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["overrideStyle"]> \| undefined` | Override a specific Feature style |
| `removeFeature` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["removeFeature"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["removeFeature"]> \| undefined` | Remove Feature |
| `revertStyle` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["revertStyle"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["revertStyle"]> \| undefined` | Revert Style |
| `setStyle` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["setStyle"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["setStyle"]> \| undefined` | Style Settings |
| `toGeoJson` | `(...args: Parameters<naver.maps.Data["toGeoJson"]>) => ReturnType<naver.maps.Data["toGeoJson"]> \| undefined` | Export entire data as GeoJSON |

## Behavior Rules

- When the `url` prop changes, the existing Feature is removed and the new KMZ file is fetched and loaded.
- After fetching the KMZ file, decompress the ZIP and find and parse the `.kml` file inside.
- If a component is unmounted during asynchronous fetch, the request is automatically aborted.
- Call `onDataError` if ZIP decommissioning or KML parsing fails.
- When unmounting a component, call `setMap(null)` after cleaning up event listeners.
- If the `map` prop is not specified, the nearest instance of `NaverMap` or `Panorama` is automatically used.

---

## Source File: api/panorama.md

- URL: https://react-naver-maps-kit.pages.dev/api/panorama
- Local Path: packages/docs/api/panorama.md

# Panorama

`Panorama` is an API that wraps `naver.maps.Panorama` in a React component. Street view and aerial view are provided.

::: warning submodule required
This component requires the `panorama` submodule.

```tsx
<NaverMapProvider ncpKeyId="..." submodules={["panorama"]}>
```

:::

## Basic usage

```tsx
import { Panorama } from "react-naver-maps-kit";

function PanoramaView() {
  return (
    <Panorama
      defaultPosition={{ lat: 37.3595704, lng: 127.105399 }}
      defaultPov={{ pan: 0, tilt: 0, fov: 100 }}
      flightSpot={true}
      aroundControl={true}
      style={{ width: "100%", height: "500px" }}
    />
  );
}
```

## public type

```ts
interface PanoramaOptionProps {
  size?: naver.maps.Size | naver.maps.SizeLiteral;
  panoId?: string;
  position?: { lat: number; lng: number } | naver.maps.LatLng;
  defaultPosition?: { lat: number; lng: number } | naver.maps.LatLng;
  pov?: { pan?: number; tilt?: number; fov?: number };
  defaultPov?: { pan?: number; tilt?: number; fov?: number };
  visible?: boolean;
  minScale?: number;
  maxScale?: number;
  minZoom?: number;
  maxZoom?: number;
  flightSpot?: boolean;
  logoControl?: boolean;
  logoControlOptions?: naver.maps.LogoControlOptions;
  zoomControl?: boolean;
  zoomControlOptions?: naver.maps.ZoomControlOptions;
  aroundControl?: boolean;
  aroundControlOptions?: naver.maps.AroundControlOptions;
}

interface PanoramaLifecycleProps {
  children?: React.ReactNode;
  onPanoramaReady?: (panorama: naver.maps.Panorama) => void;
  onPanoramaDestroy?: () => void;
  onPanoramaError?: (error: Error) => void;
}

interface PanoramaEventProps {
  onInit?: () => void;
  onPanoChanged?: () => void;
  onPanoStatus?: (status: string) => void;
  onPovChanged?: () => void;
}

type PanoramaProps = PanoramaOptionProps &
  PanoramaLifecycleProps &
  PanoramaEventProps & {
    style?: React.CSSProperties;
    className?: string;
  };

interface PanoramaRef {
  getInstance: () => naver.maps.Panorama | null;
  getElement: () => HTMLElement | undefined;
  getLocation: () => naver.maps.PanoramaLocation | undefined;
  getPosition: () => naver.maps.LatLng | undefined;
  setPosition: (position: naver.maps.LatLng) => void;
  getPov: () => { pan?: number; tilt?: number; fov?: number } | undefined;
  setPov: (pov: { pan?: number; tilt?: number; fov?: number }) => void;
  getPanoId: () => string | undefined;
  setPanoId: (panoId: string) => void;
  setPanoIdWithPov: (panoId: string, pov: { pan?: number; tilt?: number; fov?: number }) => void;
  getZoom: () => number | undefined;
  setZoom: (zoom: number) => void;
  zoomIn: () => void;
  zoomOut: () => void;
  getScale: () => number | undefined;
  setScale: (scale: number) => void;
  getMinScale: () => number | undefined;
  getMaxScale: () => number | undefined;
  getMinZoom: () => number | undefined;
  getMaxZoom: () => number | undefined;
  getSize: () => naver.maps.Size | undefined;
  setSize: (size: naver.maps.Size) => void;
  getVisible: () => boolean | undefined;
  setVisible: (visible: boolean) => void;
  getOptions: (key?: string) => unknown;
  setOptions: (options: naver.maps.PanoramaOptions) => void;
  getProjection: () => naver.maps.PanoramaProjection | undefined;
}
```

## Option properties

| Prop                   | Type                           | Description                       |
| ---------------------- | ------------------------------ | --------------------------------- |
| `position` | `{ lat: number; lng: number }` | Panoramic location (controlled) |
| `defaultPosition` | `{ lat: number; lng: number }` | Initial panoramic position (uncontrolled) |
| `panoId` | `string` | Panorama ID |
| `pov` | `{ pan, tilt, fov }` | viewpoint (controlled) |
| `defaultPov` | `{ pan, tilt, fov }` | Early point in time (uncontrolled) |
| `visible` | `boolean` | Visibility |
| `size` | `naver.maps.Size` | Panoramic size |
| `minScale` | `number` | Minimum scale |
| `maxScale` | `number` | maximum scale |
| `minZoom` | `number` | Minimum zoom level |
| `maxZoom` | `number` | maximum zoom level |
| `flightSpot` | `boolean` | Show aerial view switching button |
| `aroundControl` | `boolean` | Show Nearby View Controls |
| `aroundControlOptions` | `AroundControlOptions` | Nearby view control options |
| `zoomControl` | `boolean` | Show zoom controls |
| `zoomControlOptions` | `ZoomControlOptions` | Zoom control options |
| `logoControl` | `boolean` | Show logo control |
| `logoControlOptions` | `LogoControlOptions` | Logo Control Options |
| `style` | `CSSProperties` | container style |
| `className` | `string` | Container class name |
| `children` | `ReactNode` | Child components such as internal markers |

## Life cycle properties

| Prop                | Type                     | Description             |
| ------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- |
| `onPanoramaReady` | `(panorama) => void` | Instance creation completion callback |
| `onPanoramaDestroy` | `() => void` | Instance cleanup complete callback |
| `onPanoramaError` | `(error: Error) => void` | creation failure callback |

## Event properties

| Prop            | Type                       | Description               |
| --------------- | -------------------------- | ------------------------- |
| `onInit` | `() => void` | Initialization complete event |
| `onPanoChanged` | `() => void` | Panorama change event |
| `onPovChanged` | `() => void` | View point change event |
| `onPanoStatus` | `(status: string) => void` | Panorama state change event |

## Ref method

| Method               | Return Type           | Description         |
| -------------------- | --------------------- | ------------------- |
| `getInstance()` | `naver.maps.Panorama` | Panorama instance |
| `getElement()` | `HTMLElement` | container DOM element |
| `getLocation()` | `PanoramaLocation` | Current location information |
| `getPosition()` | `naver.maps.LatLng` | Current location |
| `setPosition()` | `void` | Location Settings |
| `getPov()` | `{ pan, tilt, fov }` | Current moment |
| `setPov()` | `void` | View point settings |
| `getPanoId()` | `string` | Current panorama ID |
| `setPanoId()` | `void` | Panorama ID settings |
| `setPanoIdWithPov()` | `void` | Simultaneous setting of ID and time point |
| `getZoom()` | `number` | Current zoom level |
| `setZoom()` | `void` | Zoom level settings |
| `zoomIn()` | `void` | Zoom in |
| `zoomOut()` | `void` | Zoom out |
| `getScale()` | `number` | Current scale |
| `setScale()` | `void` | scale settings |

## Controlled vs Uncontrolled

`position` and `pov` support controlled/uncontrolled patterns:

```tsx
// Uncontrolled: Set only initial values
<Panorama
  defaultPosition={{ lat: 37.5665, lng: 126.978 }}
  defaultPov={{ pan: 0, tilt: 0, fov: 100 }}
/>;

// Controlled: synchronized with React state
const [position, setPosition] = useState({ lat: 37.5665, lng: 126.978 });
const [pov, setPov] = useState({ pan: 0, tilt: 0, fov: 100 });

<Panorama
  position={position}
  pov={pov}
  onPovChanged={() => {
// update pov status
  }}
/>;
```

## Panorama inner marker

You can use `Marker` inside the `Panorama` component:

```tsx
import { Panorama, Marker } from "react-naver-maps-kit";

function PanoramaWithMarkers() {
  return (
    <Panorama defaultPosition={{ lat: 37.3595704, lng: 127.105399 }}>
      <Marker position={{ lat: 37.3595704, lng: 127.105399 }}>
        <div
          style={{
            background: "#FF5722",
            color: "white",
            padding: "4px 10px",
            borderRadius: 16
          }}
        >
Naver headquarters
        </div>
      </Marker>
    </Panorama>
  );
}
```

## Behavior Rules

- Can be used only when the `panorama` submodule is loaded.
- If you pass the `Marker` component to `children`, a marker will be displayed inside the panorama.
- Panorama instances are automatically cleaned up when unmounted.

---

## Source File: api/flight-spot.md

- URL: https://react-naver-maps-kit.pages.dev/api/flight-spot
- Local Path: packages/docs/api/flight-spot.md

# FlightSpot

`FlightSpot` is a component that displays the aerial view shooting location on the map.

::: warning submodule required
This component requires the `panorama` submodule.

```tsx
<NaverMapProvider ncpKeyId="..." submodules={["panorama"]}>
```

:::

## Basic usage

```tsx
import { NaverMap, FlightSpot } from "react-naver-maps-kit";

function MapWithFlightSpot() {
  return (
    <NaverMap defaultCenter={{ lat: 37.5665, lng: 126.978 }} defaultZoom={15}>
      <FlightSpot
        onPoiClicked={(panoId) => {
          console.log("FlightSpot clicked:", panoId);
        }}
      />
    </NaverMap>
  );
}
```

## public type

```ts
interface FlightSpotProps {
  onPoiClicked?: (panoId: string) => void;
  onFlightSpotReady?: (layer: naver.maps.FlightSpot) => void;
}

interface FlightSpotRef {
  getInstance: () => naver.maps.FlightSpot | null;
  getMap: () => naver.maps.Map | null;
}
```

## Properties

| Prop                | Type                       | Description                                                     |
| ------------------- | -------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `onPoiClicked` | `(panoId: string) => void` | Aerial view POI click event. Returns the panorama ID of the clicked location. |
| `onFlightSpotReady` | `(layer) => void` | FlightSpot layer creation completion callback |

## Ref method

| Method          | Return Type             | Description          |
| --------------- | ----------------------- | -------------------- |
| `getInstance()` | `naver.maps.FlightSpot` | FlightSpot instance |
| `getMap()` | `naver.maps.Map` | Linked Map Instance |

## Example of use

### Enter the panorama with FlightSpot

```tsx
import { useState } from "react";
import { NaverMap, FlightSpot, Panorama } from "react-naver-maps-kit";

function MapWithFlightSpot() {
  const [showPanorama, setShowPanorama] = useState(false);
  const [panoId, setPanoId] = useState<string | null>(null);

  return (
    <div style={{ display: "flex", gap: "16px" }}>
      <NaverMap
        defaultCenter={{ lat: 37.5665, lng: 126.978 }}
        defaultZoom={15}
        style={{ width: "50%", height: "400px" }}
      >
        <FlightSpot
          onPoiClicked={(id) => {
            setPanoId(id);
            setShowPanorama(true);
          }}
        />
      </NaverMap>

      {showPanorama && panoId && (
        <Panorama panoId={panoId} style={{ width: "50%", height: "400px" }} />
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
```

## Behavior Rules

- Can only be used inside `NaverMap`.
- Can be used only when the `panorama` submodule is loaded.
